K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-10: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i pho brang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-11: khyim dag tu bsod snyoms bslang bar bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-14: thugs kyi spyod pa goms par gyur pa'i mthus rang gi ngang gis de dag tu gshegs nas phan pa'i dngos po mdzad cing bsod snyoms slong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bkres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:23b-19: nyam chung ba'i mtshan ma yang mi mnga' la bsod snyoms slong bar mdzad kyang bshos gsol ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-1: gis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir bshos gsol ba mnga' ba'i mtshan ma ston pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can mang po 'di dag la rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-5: tha ma yod pa de dag gi dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-6: rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-7: 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar yang de dag gi snod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-8: dbang po'i skyon ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu 'tsham par de dag la chos ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can 'di dag ni nga la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-11: rim gro mi byed cing rtag par nga la smod pa'i tshig 'byin par byed pas de dag lhan cig tu gtam smra bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-12: sems can 'di dag ni nga la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-13: rim gro byed cing rtag par nga'i bsngags pa brjod par byed pas ngas de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-14: lhan cig tu gtam smra bar bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-15: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24a-16: thugs rje'i dgongs pa mnyam pa bskyed nas gnyis su med par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-0: de @24b bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byams sdang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-5: nyon mongs pa rnams mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-6: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par rab tu dben pa la dgyes shing 'dod pa chung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-7: 'du 'dzi spangs pa la bsngags pa brjod par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gcig tsam yang mi mkhyen pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-10: legs par thugs su ma chud pa mi mnga' bas thams cad du me long lta bu'i ye shes mngon sum du gyur cing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-11: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi las kyi dngos po mngon par 'du byed pa gzigs nas de dag gi yid dang mthun par 'jug cing thabs mkhyen pas drangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-12: nges par 'byung ba thob par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gal te sems can kha cig phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan par gyur pa gzigs na'ang dgyes pa skye bar mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:24b-14: de dag rgud cing phongs par gyur pa gzigs na'ang yongs su gdung ba skye bar mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-0: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de @25a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-1: dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa gzigs par gyur nas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen pos rang gi ngang gis yongs su skyob cing sdud par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-2: gal te sems can de dag log pa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa gzigs par gyur na thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen pos rang gi ngang gis yongs su skyob cing sdud par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-5: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de lta bu'i yang dag pa'i mdzad pa dpag tu med pa mnga' bar ston pa yin par rig par bya zhing khyod kyis 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-6: res 'ga' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de'ang thabs mkhyen pas bstan pa yin la ring bsrel bzhag nas sems can rnams kyis bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-7: rim gro byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu las gyur pa yin pas gang gis mchod pa byas pa de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-0: mi khom pa brgyad dang bral @25b zhing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-1: dge ba'i bshes [?] gnyen dang phrad nas dge ba'i sems stor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-2: bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan zhing myur du nges par byung nas 'khor ba dag gis blangs shing 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas 'di lta bu'i spyod pa gya nom pa gang yin pa de khyod kyis nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya zhing bag med bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-4: shin tu zab pa'i mdzad pa bkas bshad pa thos nas gus pas thal mo sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-6: bdag ni deng gdod de bzhin gshegs pa chen po yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-7: ring bsrel bzhag pa'ang sems can rnams la sman par bgyi ba lags par khong du chud pas lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-8: sems dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-10: sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa snyed mi mnyam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:25b-11: mnyam pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-1: bzhi po yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-2: byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te slar sngon gyi gnas su song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-3: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-5: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'khor mang po'i nang nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-8: bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-10: rin po che'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-11: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-13: gdugs mchog dam pas mchod pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26a-17: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu zab pa'i gsang ba dag la chos bzhin du mngon par bsgrub par bgyi lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-0: bcom @26b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-2: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-3: ngas khyod la rnam par phye [?] ste bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku rnam pa gsum mnga' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-9: chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-10: 'di ltar sku rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sdud par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-11: gang gis yang dag par rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-12: myur du 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-13: byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sprul pa'i sku khong du chud par bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-16: sems can thams cad kyi ched du chos rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrubs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-17: de ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa'ang rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du mngon par bsgrubs pas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni mnga' chen po brnyes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-18: mnga' chen po brnyes pa'i mthus ni sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-19: sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:26b-20: sems can gyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pas dus la'ang mi gzhes shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-1: las kyang yol bar mi mdzad pas dus dang mthun zhing spyod pa dang mthun par rjes su mthun pa'i chos ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-2: sku rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-4: byang chub sems dpas ji ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku khong du chud par bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-5: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-6: don dam pa'i bden pa bstan nas 'khor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-7: mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa nyid du shes par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-8: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su bsal nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-9: rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' med pa'i gzhi mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-11: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-12: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-13: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang rjes su mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir sku gang gis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27a-16: rgyab kyi 'od yongs su rdzogs pa ston pa gang yin pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @27b pos ji ltar chos kyi sku khong du chud par bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-1: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa yongs su bsal nas dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kho na nyid dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-2: sku snga ma rnam pa gnyis ni btags pa tsam du yod pa yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-3: sku gsum pa 'di ni yang dag par yod pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-4: sku snga ma gnyis kyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-6: chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-7: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas thams cad las gud na chos gzhan mi mnga' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad ni mkhyen pa phun sum tshogs par gyur na nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du nye bar zhi zhing zad nas sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par dag pa brnyes par 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-9: de'i phyir chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-10: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sdud par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad ni bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-14: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i mthar byon pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-15: bdag la phan 'dogs pa ni chos gyi de bzhin nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:27b-16: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-0: gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad pa la mnga' brnyes nas @28a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-1: mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i phyir de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bye brag tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med cing mtha' med pa snyed yod par rnam par phye ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-5: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-6: las kyi rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-7: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-8: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-10: nyan thos kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-11: chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-12: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rang dbang thob nas phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bas 'di ni mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-15: nam mkha' la ri mo bris te rgyan du byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28a-16: de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-0: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yang @28b bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-2: ji ltar na chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-3: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes gnyis las rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' par yang rang gi ngang [?] gis mdzad pa'i dngos po dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir mdzad pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-8: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mdzad pa'i dngos po de dag yongs su grub pa la mnga' brnyes pa'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang sngon gyi smon lam la brten nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te bya ba mang po rnams la mngon par 'du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-11: de bzhin du chos gnyis po dag la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bar yang rang gi ngang gis mdzad pa dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-16: zla ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-18: me long la'ang rnam par rtog pa med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:28b-19: 'od snang ba la'ang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-0: 'on kyang gsum 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung @29a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-2: de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-3: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la'ang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-4: 'od kyang smon lam la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir sems can skal ba dang ldan pa dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-5: sprul pa'i sku nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan 'dus pa las snang ba bzhin du ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-10: tshad med dpag tu med pa'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-11: me long dag 'od snang ba la brten pa'i phyir nam mkha' la gzugs brnyan mtshan ma tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang nam mkha' ni mtshan ma med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-13: de bzhin du slob ma rnams 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-14: smon lam gyi mthus sku rnam pa gnyis la mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs snang yang chos kyi sku la ni tha dad pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-16: sku gnyis po de dag la brten nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-17: chos kyi sku de la brten nas ni lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29a-19: chos gzhan thams cad ni mthar zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-0: sku gsum po 'di @29b dag la brten nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-1: sku gnyis kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-2: chos kyi sku las gud na'ang sangs rgyas gzhan med pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-3: ci'i phyir sku gnyis mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas she na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-4: sku gnyis po de dag ni btags pa tsam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-5: yang dag pa ma yin pas skad cig mar skye zhing 'gag pa dang bcas pas nges par mi gnas pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-7: yang du 'byung zhing nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-8: chos kyi sku ni de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir sku gnyis po mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-9: chos kyi sku ni gnyis su med pas de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-10: de lta bas na sku gsum po de dag la brten nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-12: so so'i skye bo thams cad ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir 'ching ba dang bcas shing sgrib pa dang bcas pas sku gsum po dag thag ring spong zhing sku gsum po dag dang nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-14: kun tu btags pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-15: gzhan gyi dbang las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-16: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:29b-17: 'di ltar mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-1: gyur pa'i phyir [?] yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-2: de lta bas na sku gsum po dag dang nye bar ma gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-3: 'di ltar mtshan nyid gsum po dag shes shing nye bar zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-4: yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-6: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni sems rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ma spangs pa'i phyir sku gsum po dag thag ring du spangs nas nye bar mi 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-8: bya ba slong ba'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-9: rtsa ba la brten pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-10: rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-11: thul bar byed pa'i lam rnams la brten nas ni bya ba slong ba'i sems zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-12: chos kyis slong ba'i lam la brten nas ni rtsa ba la rten pa'i sems zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-13: mchog tu 'gyur ba'i lam la brten nas ni rtsa ba'i sems zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-14: bya ba slong ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni sprul pa'i sku ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30a-15: rtsa ba la brten pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-0: rtsa ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur bas de'i phyir de bzhin @30b gshegs [?] pa thams cad sku gsum dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku dang po'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang mdzad pa mtshungs pa [?] dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-3: sku gnyis pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mtshungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-4: sku gsum pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang sku mtshungs par gyur pa yin no; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dang po gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi mos pa'i rjes su rnam pa mang po dang ldan pa'i phyir mtshan nyid sna tshogs ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir mang por bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni slob ma rnams yid gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig kho na ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir gcig tu bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-7: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad kun tu khyab cing mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na de'i phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-8: tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-10: dang po gang yin pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:30b-11: sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku la brten nas snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-0: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin pas rten @31a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-3: 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag ni rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni rtag pa zhes bstan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-4: mi rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bstan te sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-5: de dag tu rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas bston pa la rgyun chad med pa'i phyir de lta bas na rtag pa zhes bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-6: rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-7: phan sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po sngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir de lta bas na mi rtag pa zhes bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams yongs su sdud cing 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-9: sems can zad pa med pa bzhin du mdzad pa la yang zad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bstan to; ;rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-10: phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-11: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i chos kyang ma yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31a-12: tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' zhing rtsa ba yin par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-0: nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes @31b bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-2: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes med la; chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang mchog tu gyur pa'i spyod yul med pas chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-3: shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-4: tha dad pa'ang ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-5: de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-6: 'gog pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir gnyis rnam par dag par gyur ba yin pas des na chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-9: sku gsum po dag tu rnam par dbye na tha dad pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-10: sprul pa'i sku yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-11: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod; sprul pa'i sku'ang yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa'ang yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-12: sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa'ang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:31b-13: sprul pa'i sku yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu smon lam la mnga' brnyes @32a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-1: pa'i phyir rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-3: sa'i mdun rol gyi sku gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-4: sprul pa'i sku'ang yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang yin pa gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-6: lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-7: sprul pa'i sku'ang ma yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'ang ma yin pa gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-9: chos kyi sku gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-11: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-12: gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'ang gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-13: chos kyi sku de la mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-14: mtshan nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba gnyi ga med pas yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-18: grangs ma yin pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-21: de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes des ni mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-22: mtshan nyid kyi gnas kyang ma gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-23: yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32a-25: tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-1: grangs ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-3: mun pa'ang ma yin pa'ang mi gzigs pas de'i phyir spyod yul rnam pa dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-4: shes rab rnam par dag pa la rnam par rtag tu'ang mi rung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-5: bar zhes bya ba med kyang 'gog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-6: lam gyi gzhi byed pa'i phyir chos kyi sku 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-13: rtsa ba dpag par dka' ba'i phyir gang gis khong du chud par gyur na sku de ni theg pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-16: sku 'di nyid la brten nas dang po bskyed pa'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-17: rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-19: tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:32b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-0: chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams kyang rab tu snang @33a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-2: chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas ye shes chen po thams cad rab tu snang bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir sku gnyis po ting nge 'dzin dang; shes rab la brten nas mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-3: chos kyi sku 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas brtag pa zhes kyang bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-5: ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas pa'i phyir skyid pa zhes kyang bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-6: ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i phyir yongs su gtsang ba zhes kyang bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-7: de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-10: yongs su gtsang bar gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-11: ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs ba ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-12: chos dran pa chen po la sogs ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-16: mngon par shes pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33a-18: chos mnyam pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-0: ye shes chen po 'di la brten nas stobs bcu @33b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-1: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-2: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-3: ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-4: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-7: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten nas rin po che tshad med cing mtha' med pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-8: shes rab chen po'i rin po che la brten nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-10: de lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-11: shes rab gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing mtshan ma la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur bas rnam par brtag tu mi rung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-12: rtag pa'ang ma yin chad pa'ang ma yin pas dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-13: rnam par rtog pa mnga' yang ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:33b-14: gsum du bgrang ba yod kyang ngo bo nyid la gsum du 'gyur ba med pas 'phel ba'ang med 'grib pa'ang med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-0: sgyu ma lta bur gzung ba'ang med 'dzin pa'ang med pas chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par grol ba'i @34a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-1: gnas 'chi bdag gi rgyal po'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa skye shi'i mun pa las mngon par 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-2: sems can thams cad kyis bsgrub par mi nus shing bgrod par mi nus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-8: mi zhig gser 'dod pas de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-9: de dag tu gser gyi rdo yongs su btsal ba las gser gyi rdo de rnyed nas zhib mor btags te snying po gang yin pa blangs nas so mal du bzhus btul nas gser yongs su dag pa rnyed par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-10: yid bzhin du bsgyur te gdu bu la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su byas nas spyod pa mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni 'gyur ba ci'ang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i mchog yongs su gnyer ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-14: 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mngon par bsgrubs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-15: de'i slob ma'i 'khor mthong nas nye bar bsnyen te bcom ldan 'das la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34a-19: mi dge ba ni gang lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-0: yang dag pa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas rnam @34b par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags zhes gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-2: slob ma'i 'khor rnams de skad du zhu ba gsol ba gzigs par gyur na de'i tshe 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-3: rigs kyi bu mo 'di ni rnam par dag pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i chos yongs su nyan par 'dod pa yin no snyam du dgongs nas de la rnam par phye ste bstan pa nyid kyis go bar mdzad par 'gyur bas des thos nas kyang yang dag pa'i dran pas mi brjed par bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-4: rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i sems bskyed pas brtson 'grus kyi stobs thob nas le lo'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal te sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la ma gus pa spangs nas rgod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-5: 'gyod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar byas te sa dang po la 'jug par 'gyur bas sa dang po'i sems la brten nas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa gnyis par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-6: sa der yang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa gsum par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:34b-7: sa der yang sems mnyen zhing rnam par byang ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa bzhi par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-0: sa der yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa yongs @35a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-1: su bsal nas sa lnga par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-2: sa der yang don dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-3: kun rdzob tu mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa drug par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-4: sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod par mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa bdun par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-5: sa der yang mtshan ma nye bar zhi bar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa brgyad par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-6: sa der yang skye ba'i mtshan mar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa dgu par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-7: sa der yang mngon par shes pa drug gi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa bcu par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-8: sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-9: rtsa ba'i sems yongs su bsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur ba'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-12: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-13: sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35a-14: mtshan ma rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-0: gser yang dag par bzhus sbyangs brdungs te dri ma med par bya ba'ang gser gyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag pa @35b gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir gser gyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa'i dbang gis gser med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-3: chu rnyog [?] ma can yongs su dangs te dri ma med par bya ba'ang chu'i rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas yongs su dag pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir chu med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku'ang nyon mongs pa dang 'dres par gyur pas sdug bsngal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-4: kun 'byung ba yongs su bsal nas bag chags lhag ma med par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-5: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-8: nam mkha' la du ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-11: khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs pa dag gal te yongs su dang bar gyur na nam mkha'i khams yongs su dag par 'gyur bas nam mkha' med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku'ang sdug bsngal mang po thams cad yongs su zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:35b-14: skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-0: @36a *// sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mthong ba las rmi lam sad nas chu bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-2: pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang sems med do zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-5: 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad nas blo rnam par dag par gyur kyang med do zhes byar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med ces byar mi rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-8: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-9: las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-10: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-13: nam mkha' la brten nas ni glog 'byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36a-14: glog la brten nas ni 'od 'byung ba de bzhin du chos kyi sku la brten pa'i phyir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-0: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten nas ni @36b sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-1: rang bzhin yongs su dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-2: shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-3: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-4: de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-5: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-6: rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-7: mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-9: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no zhes de ltar nges par mngon par yid ches pa'i gang zag des ni shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud par gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:36b-13: don de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams yongs su bsal bar gyur na chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis med par khong du chud cing rnam par rtog pa'ang med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-0: 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la de bzhin nyid de mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med @37a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-1: cing yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'i phyir 'di ltar de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-2: de bzhin nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-3: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-4: de bzhin nyid dang; chos kyi dbyings dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-5: yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su sdud par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-6: sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-7: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-8: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-9: yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-10: de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas de ni yang dag pa nyid du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37a-12: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par gzigs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-0: rang sangs rgyas khams gsum las nges par byung nas @37b yang dag pa'i spyod yul yongs su tshol bas kyang khong du mi chud cing mthong bar mi nus pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-1: de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rig cing mi mthong bas so so'i skye bo thams cad the tshom dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-2: som nyi bskyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par rtog par byed pas yongs su 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-5: ri bong rgya mtsho la rkyal bar byed kyang gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-7: nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-8: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par mi rtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar yang chos thams cad la mnga' chen po brnyes shing shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-10: rang gi spyod yul du gyur cing gzhan dang yang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa nas nyid kyi sku srog la phangs pa mi mnga' bar dka' ba spyad pas dpe zla med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:37b-12: tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-0: 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dam pa @38a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-3: de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid rig cing mthong pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-6: che'i tshad kyang dpag tu med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-10: rtag par ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-11: sems rnam par g-yeng zhing g-yo ba'ang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-12: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang ci gsung yang rung ste thams cad phan 'dogs par 'gyur bas gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi grol ba'ang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-14: gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-16: 'dre srin ma rungs pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur te chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung du mi bstan pa'i dngos po mi mnga' yang spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o snyam pa'i dgongs pa'ang mi mnga'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-19: mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyang mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang ci'ang rung ste ma nges pa mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam @38b bzhi po thams cad du ye shes kyi yongs su ma bzung ba mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-1: chos thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-2: thugs rjes yongs su ma zin pa mi mnga' bas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-3: bde ba'i phan mi 'dogs pa gang yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-8: mi ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-10: mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur bas ma rabs dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-11: rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-12: rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos mnyan cing len par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-13: rtag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-15: chos zab mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:38b-17: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bstan par 'gyur bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shin tu zab pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di lan gcig rna bas thos par gyur na gang zag de ni de bzhin gshegs @39a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-1: pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-2: yang dag pa'i chos mi smod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-3: 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-4: sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel zhing yangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-6: yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams mngon par bsgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-10: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-11: lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-13: gang yang rung ba dag tu 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-15: dang po ni rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams btsan zhing dar bas phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39a-16: blo nad dang bral zhing tshe ring ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-0: bkra shis @39b dang ldan zhing bde skyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-1: dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-2: gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-5: blon po rnams 'dum zhing rtsod pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-6: g-yo sgyu dang phra ma spangs pas rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-7: gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-9: yul gyi mi rnams yang dag pa'i chos spyod pas bro nad ma mchis shing bde skyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-10: glo bur du 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-11: bsod nams mang po mngon par sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-12: bzhi pa ni dus gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag 'phrod cing rtag par lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-14: snying rje mnyam par gyur pas gnod pa mi bgyid cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-15: skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi zhing thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba ste 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:39b-17: bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel ba'i slad du 'di ltar mdo sde yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjes su 'brang zhing gang na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-2: rigs kyi bu dag legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-5: de de bzhin te khyod kyi rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-6: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur te sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-9: mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na gser gyi rnga bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40a-10: 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i shing drung na bee d'urya'i gdan la bzhugs nas 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba la chos 'chad pa'ang mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40b-0: bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa'ang mdzes pa'i tog gis thos pas thams cad ma lus par yid @40b la bzung ste dran pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40b-1: nam langs pa dang 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongs su bskor te mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs phyag byas nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40b-3: spos dag bkram ste g-yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:40b-5: bdag gi g-yar lam na bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su bzung ste dran lags na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-3: thog ma med nas rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-4: spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-5: mi dge las bcu bgyis gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-6: de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-7: de dag thams cad so sor bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-8: bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas; ;sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-10: bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-12: 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-13: dge ba'i las mang ci bgyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-14: deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-15: mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-16: dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-17: sa bcu dag la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-18: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-19: bdag gis lus dang ngag yid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-20: bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-22: bla med ye shes myur grub shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-23: deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-24: sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthol shing bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-25: byis pa srid gsum rmongs pa'i bgegs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-26: rtag par las ngan lci bar bgyis pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44a-27: bdag gis log pa'i 'dod pa bsags pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-0: rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i @44b bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-1: 'jig rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-2: byis pa thams cad kun gyi nyon mongs bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-3: sems myos rnams g-yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-4: mi dge grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-5: 'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-6: zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-7: mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs po'i bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-8: bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-9: deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-10: sdig pa'i las ni mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-11: deng bdag bde gshegs kun la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-12: bla med yon tan mtshol bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-13: gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-14: byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-15: sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-16: spyan ni rnam dag bee d'urya dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-17: dpal dang gzi brjid grags dang ldan pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-18: thugs rje shes rab nyi mas mun sel ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-19: sangs rgyas nyi mas 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-20: shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-21: thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-22: sems can nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-23: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-24: dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:44b-25: yon tan bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-0: nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar @45a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-2: kha dog bee d'urya 'dra dri med mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-3: zla ba nya ltar nam mkha' dag la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-4: shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-5: 'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-6: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-7: rga dang mya ngan chu yis ded pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-8: de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-9: sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bskams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-10: deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmad byung gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btud phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-12: 'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-13: dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-14: ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshad shes dka' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-15: sa chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-16: ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-17: rnam mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-19: sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-20: bskal pa tshad med snyed du rab bsams kyang; ;yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-21: sa chen 'di 'dra'i ri brag ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-22: rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang brtsir rung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-23: rgya mtsho'i chab ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-24: sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-25: sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45a-26: bcom ldan grags pa'i chos ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-0: mtshan bzang @45b rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-1: de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-2: bdag gis dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-3: myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-4: yang dag chos bshad skye dgu phan btags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-5: thams cad sdug bsngal mang las thar bgyid shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-6: bdud kyi dmag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-7: bla med dam chos 'khor lo bskor bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-8: bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-9: bdud rtsi'i ro yis sems can tshim bgyid shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-10: 'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-11: pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs bgyid shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-12: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-13: nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal bsal bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-14: bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-15: 'das pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-16: rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-17: sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-18: bdag gis dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-19: rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-20: mi dge ba yi rgyu kun yongs spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-21: yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-22: 'jig rten thams cad sems can ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-23: sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-24: dbang po ma tshang ji snyed mchis pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-25: de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:45b-26: sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-1: nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-2: thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rab zhi nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-3: dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-4: gang gis rgyal chos 'gal bgyis bsad la thug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-5: sdug bsngal mang gtses mya ngan rab skyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-6: de yi sdug bsngal mi bzad myong ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-7: mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-8: gang dag gzhu brdeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-9: gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-10: mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-11: lus sems rab gzir bde ba cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-12: de dag thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-13: sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-14: bsad la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-15: sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan zad shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-16: sems can gang zhig bkres skom gdungs gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-17: ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-18: long bas gzugs mthong 'on pas thos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-19: thang pos 'gro nus lkugs pas smra nus shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-20: dbul phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-21: bang mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-22: thams cad bde mchog dam par brnyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-23: sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-24: lha mi thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46a-25: byad bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-0: bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur @46b te; ;longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-1: sems can de dag rol mo bsams pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-2: sgra mchog mang po mngon du 'byung bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-3: chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-4: rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-5: sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-6: bza' btung gos dang khri dang stan rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-7: gser dngul dang ni rin chen bee d'urya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-8: rgyan phreng thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-9: sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-10: phan tshun mi mthun mthong bar ma gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-11: lus kyi byad bzhin thams cad rab mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-12: so sor byams pa'i sems kyis rtse bgyid shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-13: 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-14: yid la bsams tshe thams cad 'byor par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-15: nor rnams rnyed pa phongs pa ma mchis par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-16: bgo bshar bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-17: bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-18: me tog sna tshegs kha dog gcig min pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-19: nyin re dus gsum shing las lhung gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-20: yid bzhin longs spyod dga' ba skye bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-21: sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-22: theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-23: byang chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-24: nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-25: rtag tu ma rabs dag tu mi skye zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:46b-26: mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-1: yi gtso bor skyes gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-3: rtag par phyug po dag gi khyim skyes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-4: nor dang rin chen bang mdzod rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-5: byad bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-6: tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-7: bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-8: dpa' zhing sems rno blo gros shin tu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-9: thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-10: pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-11: rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-12: rin chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-13: bee d'urya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-14: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-15: gal te 'das pa dang ni da ltar che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-16: srid gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-17: yid du mi mchi ngan 'gro thob gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-18: thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-19: sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-20: 'khor ba'i zhags pas dam du bcings pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-21: shes rab ral gri dag gis bcad stsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-22: sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-23: sems can gang gis 'dzam gling 'di dag dang; ;yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-24: bsod nams rgyun mchog sna tshogs ci bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47a-25: de dag thams cad kun la yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-0: bsod nams dngos po dag @47b la yi rang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-1: lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyis des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-2: las mchog dam pa 'di dag rtag 'phel nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-3: bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-4: phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-5: bsam pa dvang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-6: bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-7: bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-8: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-9: bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-10: thal sbyar rtse gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-11: skye ba rtag par kun tu tshe rabs dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-12: dbang po tshang zhing lus ni yongs rdzogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-13: yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-14: ma 'ongs pa mi skye ba thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-15: rtag par lha mi rnams kyis blta bar shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-16: sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas bcu dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-18: sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-19: 'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos par gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-21: byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-22: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:47b-24: khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du gser gyi rnga po che las byung ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-0: 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa gang la la zhig gis thos par @48a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-1: gyur na bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par 'gyur zhing sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-2: kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-3: khyod kyi las mchog 'di dag thams cad ni 'das pa'i dus su bsngags pa brjod cing smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-5: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mngon par yid ches nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-6: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-7: rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-8: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa la bzhugs te shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48a-11: sku'i spu'i bu gnas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye bas phyogs bcu'i gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi tshad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-0: dper byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @48b zhing rnams 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-1: snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten du 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-2: mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-3: dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-5: nye ba dag la sri zhu ma byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-7: bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga rgyal byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-8: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag so so nas 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag mi'i gnas su phyin par gyur pas sems can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-9: 'od zer gyi mthus thams cad kyis bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-10: shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-12: ye shes kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-16: 'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:48b-17: thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te g-yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-0: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la @49a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-1: bde logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-4: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas ji ltar phyin ci log tu sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-5: sngon mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-8: deng khyod kyis tshad med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgoms nas rnam par dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-9: 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49a-11: sems can gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis sdig pa rnam mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te sems rtsa gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas dag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-0: phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs @49b rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-1: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-2: chos kyi char chen po phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-3: chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-4: chos kyi dung chen po bus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-5: chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-6: chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-7: thams cad sems can rnams la sman cing bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-8: skye dgu rmongs pa rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du mdzad par bzhed pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-11: yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-12: yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-13: ngag dang; yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btud de gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-14: bdag gis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas sdig pa'i rjes su 'brangs te sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:49b-17: gti mug gis kun tu dkris shing bcings pas sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-2: dge sdig ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-4: yid kyi sgo nas mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mtshal phyung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-5: yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-6: dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-7: dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-9: lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-10: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-11: yid kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-12: gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-13: gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-14: dge ba'i gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-15: bre srang gis bslus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-16: yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par gzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-17: mi gtsang ba'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-18: btung ba gzhan dag la stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-19: 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-20: mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-21: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-22: mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te yongs su spyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-24: 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50a-26: bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rjes su mi 'brang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-2: theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams sems la 'gyod pa skyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-3: bdag pas khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mthong na phrag dog bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-5: zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-6: phangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-7: ma rig pas bsgribs shing log par lta bas sems rmongs bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-8: dge ba'i sgyu ma bskyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la smod pa'i bsam pa skyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-10: chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-11: chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-13: yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-14: yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa dag la deng bdag srog phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol shing bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-15: thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-16: sngar ma bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-17: sngar bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:50b-18: ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-3: mi khom pa brgyad po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-4: bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zhu byang nas sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong ba smon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-5: ji ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa'ang mthol zhing bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-6: thams cad mngon du phyung ste 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-7: sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-8: ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na; las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa'ang deng mthol zhing bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-10: thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-11: sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51a-12: ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyi ba'i thugs mi thub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-0: da ltar @51b phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing 'chags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa'ang mthol zhing bshags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-1: thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-2: sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-6: rkyen de'i phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yod na skad cig tsam du'ang 'chab cing sbar mi rung na nyin gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-7: mtshan gcig nas dus ring po'i bar lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-8: gang la la zhig gis sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha ba dang bcas pas ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid ches nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-11: mi la la zhig mes mgo thod bsregs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-12: gos bsregs par gyur na myur ba kho nar me gsod par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:51b-13: gal te zhi bar ma gyur na sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-0: gang gis sdig pa byas na'ang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas @52a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-1: myur ba kho nar yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-2: gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-3: rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-4: gzhan yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po bsgom par 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-5: cho rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-9: gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-10: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-14: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52a-17: tshangs chen gyi lha dang; 'od chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-0: 'og min gyi lhar skye bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar @52b bya'o; ;gal te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-1: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-3: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-4: gal te rig pa gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-5: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-8: mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-9: yongs su dag pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-10: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-11: mi g-yo ba'i ye shes dang /
