K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na'ang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-15: chos thams cad ni rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-16: rkyen las skye bas de bzhin gshegs pas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:52b-18: rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed pa ma lus par 'gyur ba'ang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dag deng gdod skye bar 'gyur bsam 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-0: chos thams cad stong zhing de bzhin gshegs pas kyang @53a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-7: 'du byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-9: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du'ang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-11: mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas mngon par yid ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur par gang yin pa de ni sems can med cing ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-15: gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur na las kyi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas gtan du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-17: log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang dag pa'i dran pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-18: shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-19: spyod pa dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53a-20: sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @53b kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-1: rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-2: zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-4: byams sems las kyi sgrib pa sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-6: shin tu bsal bar bka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sngom las shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-9: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyi skur pa btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-10: rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar mi byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-11: srid pa gsum la mngon par zhen nas nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-13: las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-15: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma thob thams cad bshags par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-16: sems can thams cad kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-17: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:53b-18: bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-1: 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-4: bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las theg pa chen po spyod pa spyod rngo thogs pa'ang mchis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-5: spyod rngo mi thogs pa'ang mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-6: ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-9: sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-10: 'on kyang nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas rjes su yi rang bar byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-12: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa dang; tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54a-13: sems kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par gyur na de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-0: mchog tu gya nom @54b pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-2: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-4: da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-5: bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-7: mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-8: tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba dag las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang 'di ltar bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-10: ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la'ang rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-12: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-13: byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su zla ba'i phyir bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-14: thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:54b-17: chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-0: @55a *// chos [?] kyi char phab pa dag gis thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad la bskul zhing yongs su btul bas thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur nas chos kyi sbyin pas tsham [?] par mdzad pa'i dbang gis zad mi shes pa'i bde ba thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-5: sems can gang gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams da dung phun sum tshogs par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-7: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-10: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55a-11: de ltar na rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa des bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-0: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon par sgrub par gyur la rigs kyi @55b bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-1: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag par gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-5: gsos sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-6: rim gro byas pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des 'di ltar snga ma lta bur rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang bskrun na stong gi cha gcig tsam du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-8: mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de la ni grangs dang bcas shing tshad dang bcas pas bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par mi 'gyur la rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni tshad med grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pas de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-9: bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas skyes pa'i lus yongs su 'grub par 'dod na'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par byed na gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:55b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-1: ba'i bsod nams gang lags pa ni 'tshal bar gyur na slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-2: da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-3: gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba gang yin pa des nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-9: theg pa chen po'i lam bsgom par 'dod na gang zag des nyin mtshan dus drug tu snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-11: deng bdag phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56a-12: bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-0: rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la bdag bsam pa thag pa nas spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral zhing @56b bde bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-1: sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-2: chos kyi char chen po dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-3: chos kyi sgron ma chen po sbar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-4: don gyi tshul gsal par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-5: thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par bskul zhing gsol ba 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-6: deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-8: da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-9: gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:56b-10: gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-0: gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la @57a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-1: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-3: de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin pa 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste sbyin pa btang ba lta re zhig zhog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-6: gal te la la zhig gis gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas pa bas bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-7: chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-9: dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-10: gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57a-11: gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-0: gsum pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongs su dag par byed pa yin la zang zing gi @57b sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-1: bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthar thug pa med pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-2: lnga pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'dod pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-6: gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-7: nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-8: tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas nga la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-10: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-11: nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brten nas ngas stobs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-12: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:57b-13: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-1: med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-2: nga lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur yang nga'i yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-3: nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas mtshan mchog dam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-4: mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-6: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas bskal pa bye ba brgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-7: chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad la chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyis sku yongs su sdud par mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-8: chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-9: 'gag par 'gyur yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas sems can gyi tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58a-10: sems can thams cad kyi 'ching ba dgrol bar mdzad kyang dgrol par bya ba ci'ang mi mnga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-0: sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas yongs su ma smin pa gang yin pa @58b de ni yongs su smin par mdzad la yongs su smin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang mngon par 'du mdzad pa'ang mi mnga' g-yo ba'ang mi mnga' bas 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pa rab tu dben zhing mdzad pa mi mnga' bas rang dbang du gyur cing bde bar gyur pa dus gsum las yang dag par 'das kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-1: dus gsum ston par mdzad pa nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par 'byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sku tha dad par gyur ba med par yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-5: 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i chos sku ngas dang brnyes pa yin te de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:58b-6: tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de'ang tshad med par gyur pa yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci @59a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-5: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam bsgom 'tshal bas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo bar bgyi lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-8: sems can gang dag byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam bsgom pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa des nyin mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-10: bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thad du rnal 'byor bsgoms nas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang; tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags dag la kha zas changs gcig tsam byin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-11: dge ba'i tshig gis rtsod pa dag gi bsdums byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-12: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59a-14: bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-0: rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @59b ji snyed pa de dag deng bdag gis thams cad gcig tu bsdus te 'gyod cing phangs pa med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-1: rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-2: thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par dag pas 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ba de bzhin du bdag gis bsod nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ste; thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas nam mkha' las rin po che byung ste sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskang bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-3: longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-4: shes rab mthar thug pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:59b-5: dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin @60a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-1: pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-3: 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-5: ma 'ongs pa dag gis ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gi dbang gis sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thogs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-7: zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-8: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas bdud sdig can gyi dmag tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par byas te mkhyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60a-9: gzigs pa mngon par rtogs nas 'di ltar de dag thams cad skad cig ma gcig la gsal bar rtogs te nam gyi cha smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas zil dngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-0: sems can thams cad tshe dpag tu med pa @60b dang; sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-3: sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-4: sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od dang; sangs rgyas 'od brgya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-6: sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-9: sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-10: sangs rgyas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-11: sangs rgyas dam pa'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-12: sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-13: sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-14: sangs rgyas bla ma 'phags pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-15: sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-16: sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu snang mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-17: sangs rgyas tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang; sangs rgyas bla ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-19: da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:60b-20: sprul pa'i sku bstan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te sems can yongs su bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces rgya cher gong du bstan pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-1: dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-2: bud med gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-6: dran pas mi brjed par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-7: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed na bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig tu mi'i lus mngon par grub par gyur la mi'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon par 'grub par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-12: bud med gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61a-13: bla mar byas te yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bzhi pa dag gis mchod pa byas te rang sangs rgyas re re la'ang so so nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste rang sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang rin po che las mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas te mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-0: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan @61b dang; ba dan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-1: gdugs mang po dag gis rtag par mchod pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-3: 'di ji snyam du sems gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba yin snyam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-8: gal te gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i dbang po las las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-12: dran pas mi brjed par byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-13: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang bsgrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-15: bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-18: rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-21: rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:61b-23: ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-2: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas pas kyang dper byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-3: gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslabs pa thams cad bsrung ba bskul nas nyams par ma byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-4: las gsum stongs par ma gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-5: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-7: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed par [?] bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-8: dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad thogs pa med pa thob nas bsod nams tshad med par myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-9: dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po dag thob par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-10: dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62a-11: dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa shin tu lci ba dag yongs su sbyang bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-0: sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar bskul bas kyang @62b dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-3: nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-4: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang bar bskul nas byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-6: gshe zhing spyo ba'i las yongs su bsal bar bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-7: yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par smon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-8: skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-10: bsngags pa brjod par bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-11: sems can rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub par bskul nas byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-12: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya bar bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:62b-14: bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-0: bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na bzhugs nas chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams @63a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-2: shin tu zab pas gang gis dpe byar mi nus par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-3: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-6: rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-9: bdag cag kyang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-10: thams cad yongs su bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-14: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas chos 'di la brten te rab tu gnas par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-17: bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63a-18: don 'di mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-0: brgya byin la sogs pas chos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du me tog man d'a ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor bas @63b stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po thams cad rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-2: rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar rang sgra byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-3: gser gyi kha dog gi 'od zer bkye bas 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu khyab par bkang ste sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-6: 'di dag thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu lags pas byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-7: thugs rjes rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyobs cing phan 'dogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar mdzad lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-12: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-15: ngas mngon par dran te sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:63b-16: bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-1: tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad kyis lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-6: bram ze dang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas bde bar mdzad [?] pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na 'dus pa dang po la chos bstan pas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-7: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-8: thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-9: 'dus pa gnyis pa'i tshe'ang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-10: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-11: thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64a-12: 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe na'ang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zhes bya ba yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-0: nga de'i tshe bud med kyi lus su gyur te ming ni bsod @64b nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-1: 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe'ang bcom ldan 'das de la nye bar bsnyen nas gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung ste bklag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-2: kha ton du bton nas gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer pa'i phyir de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des nga la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-3: bu mo bsod nams rin po che'i 'od 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-10: bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te bud med kyi lus spangs nas de tshun chad ngan 'gro bzhi las yang dag par 'das te lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-14: mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:64b-15: che rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te deng yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-0: de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po @65a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-1: che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor nas chos mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-2: rigs kyi bu; 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba de ltar de na bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas khyod kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-6: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad de'i mtshan thos par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-8: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-9: bud med gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i thad du gshegs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis nam yang bud med kyi lus len par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-0: gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo @65b sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-2: las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-6: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gang na gnas pa'i gnas der gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-7: yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-9: yul de'i rgyal po nad med cing bgegs rnams dang bral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-10: tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-11: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing dmag tshogs dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-12: bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-14: 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-16: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-17: gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:65b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-0: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis skad mthun par bcom ldan @66a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-4: yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-6: kha ton du 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-7: yul gyi bdag po de dag la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rtag par mchis nas yongs su bsrung bar bgyid par mchi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-8: gnas pa na'ang lhan cig gnas par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-9: rgyal po de la gdon bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-10: rgol ba'i dgra zhig mchis na'ang de dag thams cad bdag cag rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-12: rims nad la sogs pa yang bsal zhing sos par bgyis nas tshe 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-14: smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin 'grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-15: rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-16: bdag cag gis yul de na dmag tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing brtson par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66a-21: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du khyed gyis mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-0: yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus na 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i rjes su mngon par sgrub @66b cing chos bzhin du spyod par byed pas khyed la sogs pa yang gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-2: phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzhal med khang [?] 'od dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-3: 'khor rnams kyang brtson zhing rgyas par 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-7: de de bzhin no zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-9: gnas gang du mdo sde dam pa 'di yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-10: spel ba'i yul de'i blon po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-11: nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-13: dang po ni phan tshun 'dus zhing nye bar sems pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-14: bla mar byed cing sdug par sems pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-15: gnyis pa ni rtag par mi'i rgyal po'i snying du sdug cing bkur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-19: yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-20: gsum pa ni nor la'ang dam par 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-21: chos la btsun par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-22: 'jig rten pa'i khe mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun tu grags nas mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-23: bzhi pa ni tshe ring bde skyid par 'gyur ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-24: 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:66b-25: gal te yul gyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis mdo sde yang dag par ston par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-2: bram ze rnams phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-8: na ba'i gsos sman rnams kyis phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-9: gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde par yid la sems shing klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-12: nags tshal dag na gnas pa na bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-13: bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-14: 'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-15: gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na mi thams cad dar zhing skyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-16: rims nad rnams med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-18: 'gron po phan tshun 'gro ba'i nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-19: rin po che mang du thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-20: bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-21: 'di dag ni yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-24: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67a-25: 'khor mang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-0: mdo sde don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gnas par gyur @67b na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na gnas shing nub par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-1: nam mdo sde 'di lta bu nub par gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-6: de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-8: thams cad sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bklag par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-9: yang dag par kha ton du gdon par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-10: yang dag par mnyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-11: yang dag par gzung bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-12: yang dag par yid la bsam par bya zhing yang dag par bsgoms nas sems can mang po'i ched du rgya cher yang dag par bstan te yongs su spel bar byed na yun ring por bde skyid cing bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-13: de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par gyur pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-14: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:67b-15: las kyis sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-1: tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa snyed dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-6: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-8: gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-11: rkyen du zhig gis ni byang chub kyi sems 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-12: gang byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-14: byang chub gang lags pa de la ni da ltar gyi sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-15: ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-16: byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs su ma mchis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-17: byang chub ces bgyi ba ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis pas sems kyang gzugs ma mchis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68a-21: mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma lags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-0: sems can @68b yang dmigs su ma mchis shing khong du chud par yang mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-2: ji ltar chos zab mo'i don gang lags pa rig par 'gyur lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-7: byang chub kyi dngos po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-8: las ni shin tu gya nom pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-9: mngon par 'du bya ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur la byang chub las gud na'ang byang chub kyi sems dmigs par mi 'gyur bas byang chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-10: sems kyang brjod du med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-15: sems can thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-18: sems gnyis ka'ang de bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-20: mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-21: 'on kyang chos rnams shes par bya ba med par ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-24: chos rnams mngon par rtogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-26: byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-27: byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-29: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:68b-31: sems can kyang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-1: yang dag par dmigs su med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-3: chos thams cad la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-4: byang chub kyang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-5: byang chub kyi ming yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-7: sems can gyi ming yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-9: nyan thos kyi ming yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-15: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-17: spyod pa ma yin pa'ang dmigs su med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-19: spyod pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmigs su med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-20: 'di ltar dmigs su med pa'i phyir rab tu dben pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-21: 'di'ang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69a-25: rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'di'ang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-0: sa chen po bzhin du dngos po mang po yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu @69b zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-3: seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa gcig pu 'gro ba la 'jigs pa med pa de bzhin du skrag cing dngang ba dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-6: rlung gi dkyil 'khor stobs po che shugs drag cing myur ba bzhin du sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-9: rin po sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtseg ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-10: them skas bzhi dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-11: sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil pa'i rlung gis bus pas shin tu bde ba myong ba bzhin du bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongs su btsal nas gang zhig rgyas par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:69b-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du sems 'dis kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-0: tshong dpon gyis thams cad kyi sems la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du sems 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongs su 'das nas yon tan gyi rin po che thob pa'i phyir 'di ni bdun pa thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes khyad par @70a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-1: du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-4: zla ba yongs su dag cing shin tu rgyas pa la rab rib med pa bzhin du sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad las rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni brgyad pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dmag la dbang ba'i blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang byed pa bzhin du sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa shin tu brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-8: yon tan tshad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni dgu pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-11: nam mkha' la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob nas dbang bskur ba'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-12: 'di lta bu'i rgyu bcu la khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-1: 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba med pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-2: sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-7: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-9: las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-10: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-11: rkyen mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-12: ngan 'gro'i sgo rnams gcod cing bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-15: bsod nams thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-17: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-19: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:70b-22: zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-2: srog la phangs pa med par bde ba yongs su mi tshol zhing 'du shes nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-3: sngon gyi las la bsams nas sdug bsngal dang phrad par 'gyur na'ang dang du len par nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-5: snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-6: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-8: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-10: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-12: nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-13: bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bde ba nyams su len par mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-14: dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa mi skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-16: snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdus nas phan 'dogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71a-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-0: @71b 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-2: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-4: dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsdus nas rnam par 'thor bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-5: rtag par rnam par grol bar smon cing mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-6: mngon par shes par thob nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa smon pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-7: chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs nas sems kyi dri ma sel bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-8: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gcod par byed pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:71b-12: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-0: gsal zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad la mchod cing nye bar @72a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-1: brten nas yongs su skyo ba mi skyed cing rgyab kyis phyogs par mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-3: chog pa'i bsam pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-5: kun rdzob kyi shes rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-6: sgom pas spangs par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-8: rig pa'i gnas lnga'i chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-10: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-12: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-14: sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-16: sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72a-17: chos tshad med pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i sgo thams cad sems kyis gsal bar rtogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-0: snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung zhing 'jug pa @72b dag [?] la rang dbang thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms nas yongs su smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsdus nas mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-4: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-6: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-8: chos thams cad gzod ma nas mi skye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-11: med pa'ang ma yin pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-12: chos thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags nas sems bde bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-13: mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-15: tha dad pa ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-16: mi g-yo ba dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:72b-17: sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-1: gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-3: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-5: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-6: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-8: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-9: legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-10: sems can thams cad kyi shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos la gzud par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-11: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor bar 'khor ba dag gis las kyi rkyen rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-12: sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-13: rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73a-14: sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de; yongs su smin par byas nas ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongs su sgrol ba gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-0: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams @73b kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-2: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-4: chos rnams kyi legs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-6: dkar po'i chos yongs su mi spong zhing yang dag par sdud pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-8: mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongs su mi skyo zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-10: ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas mthar thug pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-11: dbang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-15: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:73b-19: phan 'dogs pa'i mchog tu mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to; ;shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-0: spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la @74a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-1: sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-4: gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-5: shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-6: chos kyi rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-7: thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-8: shes rab yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-10: sems can gyi khams yang dag par rnam par phye nas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-11: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-12: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74a-13: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-0: mngon par byang chub nas @74b sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-1: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-2: ma 'dres pa'i chos la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-4: mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan nyid gnyis med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-5: thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongs su zlos pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-6: mu stegs can thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas gal te dri ba dag la legs pa rnam par bshad nas 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-7: chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-8: mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-9: skyon dang 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:74b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-1: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-2: kha dog shin tu gya nom pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-4: dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-5: yongs su dag pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-9: bdag nyid kyi lus shin tu dpa' la go chas rab tu brgyan pas phyir rgol ba thams cad pham par byas pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-13: phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis me tog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor bas sa gzhi kun tu khyab par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-17: rin rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-18: mgo me tog gi cod pan gyis brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75a-19: gang byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sa @75b drug pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-2: rin [?] po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rdzing bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-3: them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-4: gser gyi bye ma kun tu bdal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-5: yongs su dvang zhing dri ma med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-6: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-9: punda rigs [?] kun tu bkram pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-10: me tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa dag shin tu bde skyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-11: yongs su dag cing dpe zla med pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus ltung bar mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-17: 'jigs shing skrag pa'ang med par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:75b-20: bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g-yas g-yon na seng ge'i rgyal pos yongs su bsrungs pas gcan gzan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-1: sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag tshad med pas yongs su bskor nas mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-4: spyi bo'i gdugs dkar po rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pa dag gis rab tu brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-11: thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-13: mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongs su bskor ba dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-14: sa dang po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-15: 'di ltar thog ma kho nar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa deng gdong thob nas sgrub pa chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par grub par gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76a-16: rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-0: @76b dri ma shin tu phra mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-1: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad yongs su dag par gyur pas de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-3: ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang bar bsgul bar mi nus shing thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-4: thos pas 'dzin pa'i gzungs brtsam par 'gyur bas de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-5: shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa rnams bsregs nas 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-6: byang chub kyi phyogs sgom par byed pas de'i phyir sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-7: thabs mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-9: sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gdul par dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-10: spyod pa'i chos rgyun chad med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-11: mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-12: zag pa med pa la bar chad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-13: mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:76b-14: rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-0: sa de rnam par dag cing thogs @77a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-1: pa med par gyur pa'i phyir sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-2: mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa bsgoms pas rang dbang du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-3: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bsgul bar mi nus pas de'i phyir sa brgyad pa ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-4: tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas nyes pa med cing 'brel pa med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-5: dbang du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur pas de'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-6: chos kyi sku nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-7: shes rab sprin chen po lta bur gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-8: thams cad kun tu khyab par g-yogs par byed pa'i phyir de lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-11: chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-12: 'khor ba'i ngan 'gro la skrag cing 'jigs pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dang po la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-13: bslab pa'i gnas shin tu phra mo dag la shes bzhin med pas nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77a-14: las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-0: ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing mngon @77b par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-1: gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la sgrib par byed pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gsum pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-2: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-3: shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par dag pa sred cing mos pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-4: 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-6: rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-7: mtshan ma rigs pa mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par byed do; ;mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-8: mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-9: mtshan ma med par sgom par mngon par rtsol ba'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-10: mtshan ma la dbang thob pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa brgyad pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:77b-11: bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-0: yi ge tshad med pa gnyis po 'di dag la mi @78a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-1: mkhas pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-2: tshig gi spobs pa yid bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dgu pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-3: rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pa la rang dbang ma thob pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-4: shin tu phra ba'i gsang ba'i las kyi dngos po khong du ma chud pa'i ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bcu pa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-5: spyod yul thams cad la shes bya phra mos bsgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-6: nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-9: sa gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-13: sa drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78a-14: sa bdun pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:78b-5: sems bskyed pa gnyis pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do //
