K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:82b-21: yi dvags ma rungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:82b-23: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:82b-25: glo bur kyi gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:82b-26: gdon bgegs kyi 'jigs pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur zhing gdug pa'i gdon thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:82b-27: sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa bcu pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i @83a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-1: mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di dag bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-2: stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-4: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-5: zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-6: dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-7: sems can yang dag shes stor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-8: bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen gsal spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-10: chos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-11: yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-12: thams cad kun gzigs bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-13: chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-14: chos gcig 'gog par mi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-15: mnyam gzigs 'di yi dbang gis na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-16: bla med gnas su byon pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-18: mya ngan 'das la mi gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-19: mtha' gnyis dag las ma chags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-20: de slad mya ngan 'das pa brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-21: dag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-22: bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-23: rnam par rtog par mi mdzad slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83a-24: mchog tu rnam par dag pa brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-0: @83b bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-1: yi ge 'bru gcig ma gsungs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-2: slob ma mang po kun la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-3: chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-4: bcom ldan sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-5: mtshan nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-6: sdug bsngal dag gis gzir ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-7: rtag par yongs su skyob par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-8: sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-9: bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-10: gcig min tha dad min pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-11: skye med 'gag pa med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-12: de 'dra'i don ni mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-13: bshad phyir bye brag mchis kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-14: dper na lung stong brag ca ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-15: bcom ldan nyag gcig rab tu mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-16: chos dbyings rtog pa ma mchis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-17: theg pa tha dad ma mchis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-18: sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-19: rnam par phye nas gsum du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-20: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-23: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:83b-24: shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-3: gang gis yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i gang zag de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi drin bsab par bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-8: khyod kyis ji skad smras pas de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-10: gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-13: mdo sde 'dis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-14: chos kyi phyag rgya mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-15: mdo sde mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir mnyan par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-21: sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams cad kyis ni shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na kha na ma @84b tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-1: rtag par sangs rgyas mthong zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-4: yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams dang yongs su 'bral bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-5: rtag par chos gya nom pa thos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-6: gzungs kyi sgo mchog dam pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-8: rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-9: sems can gyi bsam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-11: tshig mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-12: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-13: zla ba yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-14: rmongs pa rnams yongs su btul nas yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-15: rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-16: brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:84b-17: rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-0: yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs @85a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-1: mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-2: nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-3: sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa de lta bu thams cad kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-5: de lta bu la sogs pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi skur mngon par sprul nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-6: yang dag pa'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid las g-yo ba'ang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-10: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par yongs su smin par byas kyang yongs su smin par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-11: chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang tshig las g-yos pa'ang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85a-15: skye 'gag med par mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-0: rkyen @85b gang gi phyir 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-1: 'ong ba med par bstan ce na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-2: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-3: chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-4: byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub kyi sa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-6: dge slong ma tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-7: srog chags tshad med pa snyed ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-8: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-9: chos mchog 'khor ba'i rgyun las bzlog mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-10: shin tu zab cing gya nom mthong bar dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-11: sems can dmus long 'dod pas rab g-yogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-12: ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-13: de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig car stan las langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:85b-16: gnas gang du gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa'i gnas der bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams der mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-1: ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-3: sgrib pa ma mchis shing lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-4: sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba 'thob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-5: bdag cag bsam pa thag pa nas mchod cing rim gro bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-6: nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-7: de dag gnas pa'i yul der yang phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-10: mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-11: mi rnams rab tu dar zhing rgyas par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-12: chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-14: mi ma lags pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis rtsog par mi bgyid cing mi gtsang bas sbag par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-16: chos bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas rtag par me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-20: gdugs rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-21: bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par yongs su bsrung zhing rgud pa rnams yongs su spong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86a-24: khyed kyis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa yongs su sgom par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-0: de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten du @86b yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-1: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-2: mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o;; ;;gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha dge ba'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-6: khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-7: mdzes pa'i tog gi mtshan mo rmi lam na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-8: gser gyi rnga dam pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-9: 'gyod tshangs kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-10: rkyen gang yin pa de dag ngas khyed la rgya cher yang dag par bshad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-11: sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-12: 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-13: rtag par padma'i dpes phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-14: de nas 'khor mang po rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-15: 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-16: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:86b-17: deng bdag rtse gcig spyi 'dud phyag bgyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-1: ba rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-2: bla med rnam par dag par thub ba'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-3: sku yi 'od kyis gsal mdzad gser mdog 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-4: sgra kun nang na mchog tu gyur pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-5: tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-6: dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-7: g-yas su 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por gnas; ;tshems dkar gtams pa kha dog dung 'dra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-8: rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer dag dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-9: rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-10: aud pal sngon po 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-11: ljags kyi mtshan ni yangs shing shin tu mnyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-12: dper na padma le brgan chab chung 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-13: smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-14: g-yas su 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-15: shangs kyi dbyibs mtho gser gyi gar bu 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-16: 'od mnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-17: 'jig rten dri mchog dam pa thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-18: sngon tshe gar gnas thams cad rab tu mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-19: bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-20: spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-21: sngo la rab mnyen g-yas su 'khyil bas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-22: kha dog rab mnyam dpe bgyir shin tu dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87a-23: bltams ma thag tu 'od mchog mnga' bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten @87b thams cad gsal mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-1: srid gsum sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-2: de dag thams cad bde ba 'thob par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-3: sems can dud 'gro yi dvags 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-4: lha ma yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-5: de dag sdug bsngal mang po zhi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-6: rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-7: sku yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-8: rab sbyangs gser 'dra gya nom zla ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-9: zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-10: sgros dmar mdog mdzes bung ba'i 'bras bu mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:87b-11: gshegs stobs spyod lam seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:88a-0: sems can gang reg thams cad des @88a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-4: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-6: byang chub sems dpa' ma h'a bing ga la la sogs pa dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su srung zhing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-9: sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshe cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-10: sngags lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-11: de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te gos sar pa bgos nas spos bsregs me tog gtor te bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92a-12: btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga [?] la btsugs nas sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad @92b bzlas te lus drang por bsrang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-1: yid la bya zhing smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-2: nyi ma shar ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zas gtsang ma gcig tu bza' bar bya zhing nyin gcig la zas gcig bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-3: zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung bar byed na gang zag de bsod [?] nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-4: gzi byin mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur bas ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-5: ci smon pa mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-6: gal te yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na'ang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing bsam pa bzhin du 'grub nas kyang rtag par yid la bya zhing brjed par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-7: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-8: gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-13: 'khor mang po rnams la phan gdags shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-14: de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chud par mdzad par bzhad pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-15: nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:92b-16: yang dag stong pa nyid dag chos bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-2: stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-3: zab mo'i chos ni rgya chen mang po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-4: sems can shes med rig par mi nus pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-5: de'i phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-6: stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-7: thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-8: shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-10: ngas [?] deng 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-11: bstan pas de dag stong don gsal rtogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-12: lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-13: rkun po drug gnas phan tshun yong mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-14: yul drug rkun po tha dad dbang po gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-15: so sor phan tshun mi shes de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-16: mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-17: rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-18: sna yi dbang pos rgyun tu dri yul snom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-19: lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-20: lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-21: yid kyi dbang pos chos rig skyo mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-22: dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-23: so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-24: rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-25: dbang po gnas nas mi dben 'dod pas tshol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-26: dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-27: rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93a-28: sems ni kun tshol gnas kyi rjes su 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-0: dbang rten @93b yul dmigs dngos pos rnam rig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-1: rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-2: chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-3: rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-4: mkha' la bya 'phur thogs pa med pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-5: dbang po rten byed de la ltos nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-6: phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-7: lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-8: rang bzhin mi brtan rkyen la ltos nas grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-9: yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-10: 'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-11: sa chu me rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-12: rgyu rkyen ji bzhin tha dad 'bras bu 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-13: lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-14: sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig gnas pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-15: 'byung chen sbrul bzhi rang bzhin tha dad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-16: lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-17: steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-18: de dag mthar ni zad pa'i chos su 'gro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-19: sbrul gdug rnam pa bzhi po de dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-20: sa chu sbrul gnyis phan cher thur du 'bying //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-21: me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-22: mi mthun 'di dbang nad mang skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-23: sems dang rnam shes lus 'di gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-24: dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-25: lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:93b-26: lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-2: bshang gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-3: rul myags 'bus gces blta bar yong mi mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-4: dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-5: khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar blta bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-6: ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-7: chos rnams thams cad 'dzad pas mi rtag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-8: thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-9: 'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-10: yang dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-11: de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-12: 'di dag stong zhing yang dag min rig byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-13: ma rig rang bzhin gzod ma nyid kyis med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-14: rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las yod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-15: dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-16: de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-17: 'du byed rnam shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-18: skye mched drug dang reg tshor rjes su skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-19: sred len srid skye rga shi bskyed pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-20: mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-21: sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-22: 'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshad dus med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-23: rang bzhin yod min ngo bo nyid stong yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-24: tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-25: nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94a-26: rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-0: lnga phung @94b khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-1: byang chub yang dag gnas ni btsal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-2: nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phya [?] nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-3: gya nom bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-4: yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-5: rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-6: ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-7: ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog kyang bus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-8: ngas ni chos kyi sgron chen rab kyang spar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-9: ngas ni chos kyis char chen dam pa phab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-10: nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu pha ma byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-11: bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-12: 'khor ba'i mtsho las skye dgu rmongs pa bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-13: nga yis ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo yang bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-14: nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-15: mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-16: rab bsil bdud rtsis de dag tshim byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-17: lus dang sems kyi gdung ba zhi bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-18: de nas ngas ni bskal pa tshad med snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gus mchod byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-20: tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-21: chos sku bde ba'i gnas ni btsal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-22: gzhan la mig ngang rkang lag rna ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-23: bu dang chung ma bran btang phangs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-24: nor dang rin chen bdun gyi rgyan phreng dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-25: slong ba dag la thams cad yongs su btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:94b-26: bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-2: de phyir nga ni thams cad mkhyen brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-3: sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-4: gal te stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-5: sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i dngos rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-6: nags tshal ljon shing s'a lu til rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-7: 'dam [?] la sogs yal ga ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-8: 'di la sogs pa'i dngos po bcad btubs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-9: thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-10: gang nas bsdus spungs tshad ni shes dka' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-11: de bzhin nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-12: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag ni thams cad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-13: stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-14: sa rnams rdul kyi phye mar byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-15: rdul 'di tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-16: sems can thams cad shes pa ci yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-17: shes pa de kun mi gcig rab byin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-18: 'di ltar de yi shes pa tshad med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-19: rdul phran de yi grangs ni shes rung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-20: bcom ldan thub pas skad cig gang mkhyen pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-21: shes ldan de dag lhan cig gzhal bcug na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-22: bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95a-23: cung zad tsam yang brtsi zhing shes mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-0: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab mo 'di lta bu bkas bshad pa thos nas sems can @95b tshad med pa snyed 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-1: phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-3: yul drug po yang dag pa ma yin pas 'ching ba bskyed par mngon par rtogs par gyur nas 'khor ba yongs su spangs te nges par 'byung ba yang dag par sgrub par smon lam btab nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pas spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-4: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-5: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-6: de nas lha'i bu mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'khor mang po'i nang du chos zab mo thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi tshul zab mo dag la rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i chos gang lags pa bkas bshad du ci gnang zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-8: bdag gis 'jig rten snang mdzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-9: rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-10: byang chub sems dpa' yang dag spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:95b-11: zhu na [?] thugs rjes gnang bar smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-2: gal te the tshom yod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-3: khyod kyis yid bzhin zhus shig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-4: rnam phye bstan par bya zhes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-5: de nas lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-6: byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-7: byang chub yang dag spyad spyod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-8: bdag dang gzhan la sman slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-11: chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi chos spyod pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-12: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos la spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi spyod pa bsgom par bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-13: 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byas pas chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid phung po lnga yin yang phung po lnga'ang brjod du med la phung po lnga ma yin pa'ang brjod du med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-15: gal te chos kyi dbyings phung po lnga yin par gyur na ni chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-16: gal te phung po lnga dang tha dad par gyur na ni rtag pa'i lta bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid gnyis dang bral ba; mtha' gnyis la mngon par ma chags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96a-18: blta bar bya ba las yang dag par 'das pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-0: mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi @96b dbyings bstan pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-2: ji ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byed ce na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-3: 'di ltar phung po lnga dag ni rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-4: rkyen las skye ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-7: rkyen las skyes pa zhig yin par gyur na skyes zin pa'i phyir skye'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-9: gal te skyes zin pa zhig skye na ni rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-10: rkyen dgos pa ci zhig yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-11: gal te ma skyes pa zhig skye na ni nam yang skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-13: ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-16: dgag par bya ba ma yin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-19: rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-23: rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing la'ang brten /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-26: lag pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i phyir sgra 'byung bar 'gyur yang 'di ltar rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang stong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-28: da ltar byung ba'ang stong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-30: rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing las kyang mi 'byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-34: dus gsum las kyang mi 'byung bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:96b-36: ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-1: par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-2: gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de ni gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-3: gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rtag par yang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-4: chad par yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-5: rtag par yang ma yin chad par yang ma yin pa de ni gcig pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-6: tha dad pa'ang ma yin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-8: gal te 'di gcig pa zhig yin na ni chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-9: gal te de lta yin na ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyang yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-10: de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir gcig pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-11: gal te tha dad do zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon par zhen pa dang bcas pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-14: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97a-16: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'du byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-0: 'du byed ma yin pa dag la yang dag par ngo bo nyid @97b du mnyam par rtogs pas de'i phyir tha dad pa'ang ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-1: de lta bas na phung po lnga po dag ni yod pa ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-6: rkyen med pa las skyes pa'ang ma yin bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-7: 'phags pas shes par bya ba yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-8: gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-9: tha snyad kyis rig par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-16: tha ma med par rab tu dben pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-17: gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas de'i phyir phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par nus pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-20: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas don dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-21: kun rdzob las gud na yongs su tshol bar byed na de ni shin tu dpag cing bsam pa dka' ba yin te so so'i skye bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-22: 'phags pa'i spyod yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-23: tha dad pa'ang ma yin pas kun rdzob kyang mi spong la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-24: don dam pa dang yang mi 'bral bar chos kyi dbyings la brten nas byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:97b-25: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-0: rigs kyi lha mo dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa @98a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-1: gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas sems rtse gcig tu mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-3: gong du ji skad bka' stsal pa'i byang chub kyi yang dag pa'i don la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la deng bdag gis bslab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-4: de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos 'khor mang po'i nang du lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-5: byang chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba yin na deng khyed kyis ji ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa la rang dbang thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-6: de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa ltar na 'di ni yang dag par shin tu zab pa yin pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don shes par mi 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98a-9: 'di ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin pas shin tu gya nom zhing shes par dka' ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-0: gal te deng bdag gis chos 'di la brten nas bde bar gnas par 'thob pa bden te mi rdzun par gyur na dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can tshad med grangs med @98b mtha' med pa thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te skyes pa'ang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i padma la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-1: bde ba tshad med pa myong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-2: lha'i me tog dam pa'i char mngon par 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-3: lha'i rol mo'i cha byad rnams ma dkrol bar rang sgra 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-4: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces de'i tshe rigs kyi lha mos de skad ces smras ma thag tu dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad gser gyi gyi kha dog tu gyur nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan te skyes pa'ang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i padma la 'dug ste bde ba tshad med pa dag la longs spyod par gyur pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du ngan 'gro rnams kyang med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-5: rin po che'i ljon shing phreng du dkrigs shing rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-7: lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par phab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:98b-8: lha'i rol mo rnams kyang byas te rigs kyi lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'ang bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas tshangs pa'i lha'i lus su gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-0: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos @99a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-1: byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-2: khyod ji ltar byang chub kyi spyad pa yongs su spyad par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-5: gal te chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-6: gal te rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-7: bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-8: gal te smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-9: gal te lung pa'i brag cha byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-10: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-11: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-12: khyod don gang la brten nas tshig 'di smra bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-15: chos gcig 'ga' tsam yang de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa med mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-17: rkyen gyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-18: tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99a-19: gal te de lta bu yin par gyur na 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-0: khyod ci la bsam te 'di skad du smra @99b par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-2: gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-3: shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-5: byang chub ma yin pa'ang tha dad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-6: rnam par grol ba'ang tha dad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-7: rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'ang tha dad pa zhig yin snyam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-9: 'di ltar chos rnams ni mnyam zhing tha dad pa med de chos kyi dbyings 'di la de bzhin nyid tha dad par gyur pa med pas mngon par zhen par bya ba'i bar zhes bya ba'ang med de 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-14: sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma sgyu ma ston pa la shin tu mkhas pa zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor gseg ma ngang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-16: shing gi lo ma la sogs pa blangs te phung po gcig tu spungs nas sgyu rtsal rnams kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-19: dmag la sogs pa'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-20: rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-21: bang mdzod rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sprul par gyur na sems can gang dag glen zhing gti mug can du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-22: dpyod par mi nus pa; sgyu ma'i rtsa ba mi shes pa dag gis mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:99b-23: thos par gyur na 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong zhing thos pa'i glang po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-0: rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de @100a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-1: dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-2: gzhan ni brdzun pa yin no snyam du sems pas phyis legs par so sor rtog cing sems pa'ang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-3: gang blo dang ldan pa dag ni de ltar ma yin te sgyu ma'i rtsa ba rab tu shes pas gal te mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-4: thos par gyur na'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar mthong ba'i glang po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-5: rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-6: sgyu ma'i dngos po mig slu bar byed pa tsam zhig yod par zad de mi bden pas glang po che la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-7: bang mdzod rnams yod do snyam du mi sems pas ming tsam zhig yod par zad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-8: yang dag pa ni ci'ang med do snyam du sems pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-9: bdag nyid kyis ji ltar mthong zhing thos pas de dag la'ang yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin par yang mi byed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-10: phyis dpyod cing sems pa'i tshe'ang yang dag pa ma yin par rab tu shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-11: de bzhin du blo dang ldan pa dag gis kyang chos thams cad la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pas kun rdzob kyi rjes su ji ltar mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100a-12: ji ltar thos pa bzhin du dngos po ston cing brjod par byed kyi bden pa'i tshul yid la byed pa'i tshe ni de ltar ma yin te btags pa tsam du yang dag pa'i don rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-1: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa dag ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa mi shes pa'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo dag 'du byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-2: 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-3: thos par gyur na 'di ltar yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du bsams nas mngon par zhen par bskyed nas don dam par chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa yin par mi shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-4: 'phags pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni 'du byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-5: 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-6: thos par gyur na ci nus ci lcogs kyis yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du mngon par zhen pa skyed par mi byed pas thams cad du yang dag pa'i 'du byed kyi chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-7: yang dag pa'i 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos med kyi mi bden pas bsams pa'i 'du byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-8: 'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de dag gis ming tsam zhig yod pas yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ci'ang med do snyam du rig cing khong du chud par gyur kyang 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kun rdzob kyi rjes su gzhan dag yang dag pa'i don rtogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir yang dag par ston par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-9: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:100b-10: 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kyang 'phags pa'i shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-1: rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par rtogs par gyur kyang 'du byed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-2: 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos 'di ltar gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-3: tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-4: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-5: sems can ji snyed cig gis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-8: sgyu ma'i skyes bu mang po'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-9: sems las byung ba'i chos kyis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-10: tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-11: sgyu mas sprul pa'i skyes bu gang yin pa de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin na 'di dag gi sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-12: sems las byung ba gang las skyes par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-14: gang gis chos kyi dbyings yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin par shes pa'i sems can de dag gis don zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-0: byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas don zab mo 'di lta bu @101b mngon par rtogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-5: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis bstan nas khyod mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa bsgom zhing bslab par sems bskyed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-6: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-8: shin tu dkon zhing ngo mtshar che'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-9: bdag cag ni deng skyes bu 'di dang phrad pas yang dag pa'i chos thos par gyur to zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-12: yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni ma 'ongs pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-19: bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:101b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar ba dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-1: bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-2: lha'i bu 'bum phrag brgyad stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-5: mi phal pa tshad med pa grangs med pa snyed ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-6: de nas de'i 'khor mang po de'i nang nas dge slong 'bum phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa thos nas thams cad shin tu brtan par gyur nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam mchog yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-7: so so nas rang gi gos phung de byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas nas mchog tu brtson pa'i sems bla na med pa bskyed de smon lam 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102a-8: bdag cag bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-0: dge slong mang po dag ni bsod nams 'di la brten nas ji skad bsten pa @102b bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pas bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das nas khong du chud cing go bar 'gyur bas 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mang po de dag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-2: khyod bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-3: bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-4: zhing gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-5: dus gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas thams cad ming mthun par smon lam gyi bkod pas brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-7: gser 'ong dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gang gis yang dag par mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na gzi byin chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur bas gang la la zhig gis bskal pa chen po brgya stong du ma'i bar du thabs dang mi ldan par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su spyad pa bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:102b-9: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser 'od [?] dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger bris nas zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu klog gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-0: kha ton du 'don par byed na 'di'i bsod nams @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-1: dang bsgrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bgrang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-3: rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-5: de'i phyir ngas deng khyod kyis bslab par bya zhing dran pa yongs su bzung nas gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-7: ngas sngon [?] byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su spyad pa na ji ltar dpa' bo g-yul ngor 'jug pa bzhin du lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-8: srog la phangs pa med par 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di yongs su spel zhing yang dag par bzung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-10: kha ton du bton nas gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gal te 'jig rten na 'dug par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yang nub par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-15: gal te rgyal po tshe zad par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yod pa dag kyang de nyid du nub cing zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-17: de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gal te 'jig rten na gnas par gyur na ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rin po che rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103a-18: gal te mdo sde 'di med par gyur na ni gnas de nyid du nub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-0: de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal @103b bo 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-2: kha ton du gdon par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-3: gzhan dag la bstan par bya zhing yi ger 'dri bar bskul nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad de lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-4: srog la'ang phangs pa med par rab tu brtson par byed na bsod nams kyi nang na mchog tu 'gyur bas nga'i slob ma rnams kyis de bzhin du rab tu brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bslabs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-5: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-7: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-8: gnod sbyin rnams dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-10: bdag cag sems can thams cad gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-11: chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po gang lags pa de dag yongs su bsrung zhing spel bar bgyid la gal te bgegs bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag gis yongs su bsal nas dge ba mang po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-13: mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-14: spobs pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:103b-16: sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-1: bde ba myong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-2: yul gang na gnas pa der mu ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-4: mi ma lags pa dag gis 'tsho zhing gnod pa bgyid par gyur na bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs nas skye bo rnams bde zhing skyid cing longs spyod rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-5: glo bur gyi gnod pa rnams ma mchis par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-6: 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig 'khor rnams kyi mthu lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-7: gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la mchod par bgyis na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i bsam pas bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-10: tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-11: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bar la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-14: khyod kyis chos zab mo gya nom pa thos nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104a-15: mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrungs shing yongs su bskyangs pas bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa mtha' med pa snyed thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-0: de nas de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas bcom @104b ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste spyi bos blangs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-1: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-2: stong pa nyid la brten nas smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-3: de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-4: lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-5: lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-6: lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-8: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtag par dgongs shing gzigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bkur sti bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-11: klu thams cad kyis rtag par mchod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-12: lha'i 'khor rnams kyis rtag par dga' ba skyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-13: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis rtag par bsngags pa brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-15: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:104b-16: lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-0: sems can thams cad la khyad par du @105a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-4: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bgyid pa; 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad rab tu sel ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-5: phas kyi dgra thams cad phyir zlog par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-6: mu ge'i dus ngan pa'i tshe lo legs par bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-7: rims nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-8: ltas ngan pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-9: sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa brgya stong rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-11: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bde ba stsol cing bdag cag la'ang sman par bgyid pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-12: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro 'di thos par gyur na mthu stobs dang ldan zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-13: brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105a-14: rdzu 'phrul yang ches lhag cing khyad du 'phags par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-0: bdag cag rgyal po bzhi'ang chos yang dag par mngon par sgrub cing rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan nas chos kyis 'jig rten @105b 'dul bar bgyid pas bdag cag gis lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-8: lto 'phye chen po de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-9: mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba la 'god par bgyid pas sdig pa'i las rnams 'gog cing yongs su sel bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-10: mi'i mdangs 'phrog par bgyid pa'i 'dre srin byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-11: snying rje ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thag ring du mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-13: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-14: gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las yang dag par 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir blta bar bgyid cing yongs su bskyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-15: yongs su bzung bar bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-18: rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal po rnams kyang 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-20: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul gyi rgyal po gang la la zhig la phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams rtag par nye bar mchis te gnod par bgyis par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:105b-22: rims nad mang pos gnod par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-0: ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed byung bar @106a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-3: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-4: mchod pa bgyid pa'i dge slong chos smra ba gang la la mdo sde 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-6: klog cing kun chub pa zhig mchis par gyur na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i thad du mchis te go bar bgyis nas de la bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs par bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-7: chos smra ba de'ang bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis go bar bgyis pa'i mthus yul khams der mchis nas gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar bgyid pas mdo sde 'di'i mthus gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-8: ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi zhing yongs su sel bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-10: mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba yul der mchis par gyur na mdo sde 'di'ang yul der gshegs par rig par bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106a-12: de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po de chos smra ba'i thad du mchis nas des chos bstan pa gang lags pa mnyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-0: thos nas kyang rab tu dga' @106b bas chos smra ba de la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-2: rim gro bgyis te shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas yongs su bsrungs nas mya ngan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-3: gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te mdo sde 'di'ang yang dag par bstan nas thams cad la phan gdags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-6: rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi thams cad sems rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-7: yul gyi mi thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spongs shing rtag par bde ba la reg par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-12: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis par gyur na de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-13: ci 'tshal ba sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid par gyur na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis yul gyi bdag po de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-14: yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu bde bar bgyid cing gnod pa rnams thag ring du spong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-16: gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:106b-19: kha ton tu 'don par bgyid pa la mi'i rgyal po des mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-0: bla mar bgyis te bsngags pa brjod par bgyid na bdag cag rgyal po de rgyal po rnams @107a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-1: kyi nang na mchog tu btsun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-2: gus pas bla mar bgyis pas yul gyi rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-3: 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-4: rab tu dga' bas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-5: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-6: rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-7: mi rnams la blta zhing brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-8: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-12: mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-13: yongs su srung bar byed pa gsan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-15: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po khyed cag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107a-18: bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-0: yang dag pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan te 'di ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba yin pas khyed cag yun ring po nas sems can @107b rnams la rtag par phan 'dogs shing byams pa chen po'i sems bskyed nas bde ba sbyin par smon pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na khyed cag da ltar rnam par smin pa mchog la longs spyod pa yin no [?] mi'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-1: gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde 'di la bkur sti byas nas mchod pa byed pa zhig yod na khyod kyis nan tan bskyed de yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba thob par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-2: khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-4: gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis mdo sde 'di yongs su srung bar byed na des 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-6: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur bas khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-9: lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe rtag tu rgyal ba'i phan yon 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-10: khyed cag mdo sde 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed na mdo sde 'di'i mthus sdug bsngal mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:107b-14: rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi zhing yongs su sel bar byed pas de'i phyir khyod kyis gal te 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-0: kha ton du 'don par mthong bar 'gyur na rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis @108a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-1: yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa bsal te bde ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-2: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-4: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-9: 'brog dgon pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu yongs su spel zhing gnas par gyur na yul de'i rgyal pos mdo sde 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su bzung ste bsngags pa brjod nas mchod par bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-10: mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la yo byad sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngags te gnod cing mi bde ba dag yongs su spong bar bgyid na rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-11: rkyen des bdag cag rgyal po de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-12: mi mang po rnams yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba la bkod de mya ngan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-13: sdug bsngal rnams thag ring du spangs nas tshe 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108a-14: gzi byin phun sum tshogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-0: yul gyi bdag po des 'khor bzhi po de dag mdo sde 'di yongs su @108b 'dzin pa mthong nas gus pas yongs su bsrungs te pha ma bzhin du ci 'tshal ba thams cad sbyar te mchod par bgyis na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas sems can mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas de'i slad du bdag cag gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-1: 'dre srin tshad ma mchis pa dang bcas par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang du spel ba'i gnas der lus sbas nas yongs su skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-2: yongs su srung ba bgyid pas bgegs rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-3: mdo sde 'di nyid nyan pa'i gang zag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-4: rgyal po la sogs pa la'ang yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid pas gnod pa yongs su bsal nas bde ba la 'god pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-5: phyogs gzhan nas mchis pa'i dgra rnams kyang slar zlog par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-7: gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa'i tshe nye 'khor na gnas pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams te yul de dag gzhom mo snyam du sems par gyur na'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-9: 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus de'i nye 'khor gyi dgra de la phyir rgol ba'i dgra tha dad pa gzhan mchis nas gzhom par bgyid cing de'i yul khams su ltas ngan mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:108b-10: rims nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i che rgyal po des de lta bu mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-0: @109a *// dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams nas yul der chas te gzhom par bgyid pa na bdag cag kyang de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-1: 'dre srin gyi 'khor ched ma mchis shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-2: mtha' ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas pas so so nas rang gi lus sbas te yongs su bsrungs nas grogs bgyid pas de nyid kyis phyir rgol ba'i dgra de rab tu dul bar 'gyur bas yul khams der mchi ba'i thugs kyang mi thub na phan tshun dmag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-3: mtshon gyis 'thab pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-5: rgyal po chen po bzhi po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-6: khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde 'di yongs su skyong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-7: yongs su srung par byed pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-9: nga sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'das pa na dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes nas chos 'di bstan pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-11: gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung nas bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109a-12: mchod pa byed na gnod pa rnams pa nye bar zhi nas rab tu bde bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-0: grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar @109b 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-1: phyir rgol ba'i dgra rnams zlog par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-2: 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa'i rgyal po thams cad la gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-4: rtsod pa'i dngos po rnams gtan med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-5: rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-6: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na yod pa'i grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-8: grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis mi'i rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po rnams kyang so so nas rang rang gi yul du longs spyod kyi bde ba myong zhing rang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-10: rin po che dpal 'byor gyis rgyas pa dag la longs spyod par byed pas phan tshun 'phrog par mi byed cing sngon gyi rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa dag la longs spyod par byed pas bsam pa ngan pa bskyed nas gzhan gyi yul 'dod pas 'byor pa yongs su tshol ba med de thams cad 'dod pa chung zhing phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa skye par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-13: bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-14: yul de dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-15: bla 'og mthun zhing chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa lta bur sems kyis phan tshun sdug cing bkur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-16: rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:109b-18: snying rjes phan 'dogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar byed pas rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-1: des na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-2: mi rnams rgyas shing rab tu gang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-3: sa chen po mthu dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-5: dus tshigs mi mthun pa med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-9: rgyu skar rnams kyang sngon gyi gnas las 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-11: char pa'ang dus bzhin du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-14: rin po che rnams 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-15: sems la ser sna'i 'jungs pa med cing rtag par sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-16: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-17: mi rnams tshe 'phos par gyur na'ang phal cher mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-18: lha'i 'khor rnams rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-20: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di mnyan te yongs su bsrungs nas gus pas mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-21: mdo sde 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-22: gzhan la'ang khyed 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110a-23: gnod sbyin gyi 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-0: bde bar phan 'dogs par 'dod na de'i phyir rgyal po des rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di @110b mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar byas te yang dag pa'i chos kyi chu bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dam pa 'di thos pa'i dbang gis khyed la sogs pa'i lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-1: sems kyi mthu stobs 'phel bar byed pas brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-3: gzi byin rnams rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-4: mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin par byed na de ni yangs shing rgya che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-5: shin tu dkon pa'i mchod pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te gang gis nga la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-7: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-8: gang gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-9: rkyen des na khyed la sogs pas rgyal po de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:110b-12: 'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas gnod cing nyam nga ba med par byas te pho brang bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyang rtag tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba la 'god par byed na bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-0: @111a *// yul de dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-1: dngos po ngan pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-4: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-7: rgyal bu nas pho brang nang gis slas la sogs pa'i bar dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-10: pho brang yongs su srung zhing skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dga' ba mchog dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-12: rab tu dben pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-13: tshe 'di nyid la rgyal thabs btsun zhing mtho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-14: dbang phyug dang ldan zhing dar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-16: gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-17: mtha' ma mchis pa yongs su sdud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-18: rang gi yul du phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111a-21: gdon bgegs kyi dngos po rnams ma mchis par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-0: 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des bag @111b ma mchis pas sems g-yeng bar mi bgyi zhing shin tu gus pa bskyed de bsam pa thag pa nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di mnyan cing yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-1: chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i tshe sngar rgyal po la gces pa'i pho brang mchog dam pa rab tu brgyan te gsal ba'i phyogs su spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste me tog mchog dam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor nas seng ge'i khri chos kyi gdan khyad par du 'phags pa btsugs te rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-2: rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-4: ba dan bsgreng ste rin thang ma mchis pa'i spos bsregs nas rol mo rnams bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-5: rgyal po des de'i tshe yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te spos kyi byug pas lus bskus nas gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te rgyan phreng rnams kyis brgyan nas stan dma' ba la mchis te mtho ba'i bsam pa mi bskyed par dbang phyug gi thabs yongs su spang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-6: nga rgyal rnams spangs te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-7: chos smra ba'i mkhan po la ston pa chen po'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:111b-8: pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-2: brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas rab tu dga' bas phan tshun blta bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-3: shin tu mthun pa'i mdangs kyis tshig 'jam por smra bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-5: sems la dga' ba chen pos kun tu khyab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-6: deng bdag ni shin tu bsam par dka' zhing khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon chen po yangs zhing rgya che ba 'di lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas mdo sde'i rgyal po de la rab tu mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-7: de ltar bsams lags nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po der mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur na shin tu gus pa chen pos dkon pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-9: 'di ltar chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mi bsu bar mi bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-10: de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des gos gsar pa bgos nas rgyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-11: phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan te bdag nyid gdugs dkar po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112a-13: me tog thogs nas dmag gi dpung bshams te rol mo rgyas par byas nas rkang gis grong khyer nas phyir byung ste bkra shis kyi dngos po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir gus pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po de bsu bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-0: rgyal @112b po chen po bzhi po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-2: rkyen gang gi phyir mi'i rgyal po des bdag nyid kyis bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-3: mchod pa de lta bur dgos she na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-4: mi'i rgyal po de rkang pa bteg cing rkang pa bzhag pa na gom pa re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams la bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-7: bla mar byed par 'gyur zhing gzhan yang bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa'i grangs de snyed du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i longs spyod mchog khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-10: gom pa re re bor ba'i dbang gis tshe 'di nyid la'ang bsod nams 'phel bas rang dbang du rgyal po byed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-11: mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-12: bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-13: mis yongs su spyad pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dag la longs spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-14: skye ba thams cad du rgyal po byed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-16: tshig gi spobs pa dang ldan pas lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:112b-17: mi kun gyis mngon par yid ches par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-2: grags pa chen po dang ldan zhing mang po kun gyis yongs su blta bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-4: mi'i nang du khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par 'gyur /
