K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-6: gzi byin chen po'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-7: lus kyi mtshan gya nom zhing shin tu mdzes pas dpe zla med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-9: mi'i ston pa mthong bar gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-11: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa mngon par 'grub cing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-13: 'di ltar shes par bya ste mi'i rgyal po de dag gis yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa de lta bu mthong ba'i phyir bdag nyid dpag tshad gcig nas dpag tshad brgya stong du ma'i bar du chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsu bar bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-14: chos smra ba'i mkhan po la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113a-16: grong khyer du phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa bdag gi pho brang du gshegs nas bdag gi mchod pa bzhes te bdag la chos ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-0: bdag kyang chos thos pa'i dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @113b pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bas 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang phrad par gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-1: deng bdag gis ni shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-3: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-5: deng bdag gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-8: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rtsa ba nas bton to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-9: deng 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-11: tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-12: deng sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bton nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-13: deng tshad med mtha' med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bsags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-14: pho brang nang gi slas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-15: skye bo mang po bde ba la bkod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-16: yul rnams rab tu zhi bar byas pas gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:113b-18: mi ma rungs pa med cing phyogs gzhan yang 'ongs pa'i dgra rnams nye bar 'ongs nas gnod pa mi byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-0: nad rnams med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams @114a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-3: 'di ltar rig par bya ste de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po de dag gis da ltar yang dag par chos la btsun par byas shing bla mar byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-4: mdo sde dam pa 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-7: dge bsnyen ma dag la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-9: bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-10: bsod nams mchog gang yin pa de dag thog ma kho nar 'khor dang bcas pa la yongs su bsngo bar byed na mi'i rgyal po de dag bsod nams chen po'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-11: rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur bas tshe 'di nyid la dbang chen po thob nas gzi byin rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-13: mtshan mchog rnams kyis rab tu brgyan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-14: phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag pa'i chos kyis tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114a-17: mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la gus pas bkur sti bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-0: mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la @114b bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-2: bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyis na de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi gdan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-3: nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste me tog mchog dam pa mang po mngon par gtor nas rgyal po chen po bzhi mchis pa'i stan yang bshams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-5: bdag cag kyang rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i chos nyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-6: rgyal po des kyang bdag cag la phan 'dogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi skal pa gang lags pa bdag cag la'ang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-7: bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des chos smra ba la chos bshad par gsol ba btab nas stan la mchis pa'i tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-8: bdag cag gi slad du spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:114b-10: de'i tshe spos kyi bdug pa de dag skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bdag cag lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang du phyin te spos kyi gdugs su 'gyur pas bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyang spos kyi dri mchog de tshor bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-0: spos kyi du ba de'ang gser 'od dang ldan pas bdag @115a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-1: cag gnas pa'i khang khyim nas tshangs pa'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-2: brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-3: lha mo spobs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-4: lha mo dpal chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-5: sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-6: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-7: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-8: lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-9: lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-10: sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-12: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-13: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas thams cad kyang rab tu gsal bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-15: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi gzhal med khang du spos kyi bdug pa des skad cig yud tsam cig la spos kyi gdugs su gyur pa'ang mthong la spos kyi dri'ang tshor bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-16: 'od zer gyi kha dog gis lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po dag la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115a-18: spos kyi 'od zer des gzhal med khang de dag 'ba' zhig gsal bar byas nas spos kyi gdugs su gyur te 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-0: mi'i rgyal po de dag lag pa pog @115b phor bzung ste spos mchog dam pa bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byed pa'i tshe spos kyi du ba de thang cig yud tsam gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i nyi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-1: zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-2: ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-3: gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-12: khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byas nas nam mkha' kun tu gang zhing rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-13: spos kyi bdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag sprin gyi gdugs su 'gyur te gdugs de'ang gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pas lha'i khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byed de 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-14: spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i gzi byin gyi mthu las gyur pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:115b-15: mi'i rgyal po de dag lag tu spos phor thogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-0: mdo sde 'di la mchod par byed pa'i tshe spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ba' zhig tu khyab @116a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-1: bar gyur pa ma yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-2: skad cig yud tsam gcig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med mtha' med pa kun tu khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi nam mkha' kun gyi spos kyi gdugs su gyur nas kun gsal bar byed pa'ang de bzhin te de'i tshe sangs rgyas mang po de dag spos gya nom pa'i dri gang yin pa de dag kyang rig cing mkhyen /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-4: gser gyi kha dog de dag kyang gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po de dag gis mthun par gzigs shing so sor brtags te gsung mthun par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la skyes bu chen po khyod kyis shin tu zab pa'i mdo sde gya nom ba 'di rgya cher yongs su spel nas bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-5: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116a-6: gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu mnyan nas thos pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de'i tshad kyang shin tu mang ba yin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-4: gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-5: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-8: sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-10: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa'i gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung gcig tu chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-11: legs so zhes bsngags pa 'di brjod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:116b-13: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis dga' ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed mngon par bsgrubs te tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas nas 'phags pa mang po las yang dag par 'das te khams gsum las nges par byung nas gtso bo mchog tu gyur te byang chub kyi shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su brgyan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-1: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rkyen dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-2: shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i bdud kyi dmag tshogs rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-3: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-4: shin tu zab pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-6: khyod rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-8: gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-9: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rnga chen po mchog tu gyur pa rab tu rdung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-10: bla na med pa'i chos kyi dung shin tu gya nom pa 'bud par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-11: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa bsgreng bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-12: bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma shin tu gsal bar spar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-13: bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-14: nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i 'ching ba tshad med pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117a-15: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed mtha' med cing 'jigs su rung ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzlas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-0: mu med pa'i skye shi'i 'khor ba las thar @117b bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-1: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang phrad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-4: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni slad ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-5: da ltar gyi tshe yon tan tshad ma mchis pa 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po gang gis mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di thos par gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-6: mi'i rgyal po de dag la bdag cag rnams yongs su bsrung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-8: bsod nams kyi phan yon tshad ma mchis pa snyed mthong ba'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:117b-10: yi dvags 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams su spos kyi bdug pa'i sprin gyi gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-0: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mthong ba'i tshe bdag cag rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis nas chos nyan pa'i slad du rgyal po de'i pho brang yongs su gtsang zhing mdzes @118a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-1: par brgyan pa chos 'chad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-2: de bzhin du tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-4: lha mo spobs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-5: dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-6: sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-7: sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-8: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-9: lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-10: lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-11: sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-12: 'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-13: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-14: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-16: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyang chos nyan pa'i slad du so so nas rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis te mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-17: chos kyi gdan shin tu mdzes par bgyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-18: chos bshad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118a-20: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-0: gnod sbyin rnams thams cad sems rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por gyur pa'i rgyus bdud rtsi'i ros bdag @118b cag tshim par gyur pas de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po de la yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams yongs su bsal te bde ba thob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-4: yul rnams su'ang sdig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-5: ltas ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-6: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-8: mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig rang gi yul du mdo sde 'di bzhugs par gyur kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-9: yongs su spel bar yang mi bgyid la sems kyis kyang spong bar bgyid cing nyan par yang mi mos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-13: bsngags pa brjod pa'ang mi bgyid la 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong bar gyur na'ang bla mar mi bgyid cing mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-17: lha tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos thos par mi 'gyur bas bdud rtsi'i ro la rgyab kyis phyogs shing dam pa'i chos kyi rgyun yang stor bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-19: mthu stobs kyang ma mchis par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-20: ngan 'gro 'phel bar bgyid cing lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:118b-21: mi rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-1: ba'i chu bor bying bar 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i shul dang gol bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-3: bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-5: gnod sbyin la sogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po mthong bar gyur na yul de yongs su spong bar bgyid la yongs su skyob cing yongs su bsrungs pa'i sems kyang yongs su ma mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-6: bdag cag 'ba' zhig rgyal po de spong bar bgyid pa ma lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-7: yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang yal bar bor nas mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-8: de ltar yal bar bor ba'i dbang gis yul der gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rgyal thabs kyang stor bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-9: mi'i tshogs thams cad dge ba'i sems ni ma mchis kyi gcig la gcig 'ching ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-14: gya gyu bgyid cing nongs pa ma mchis pa la chad pa gcod pa 'ba' zhig sems pas nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119a-16: gza' mjug rings yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-0: gza' 'jug pa la rgyun chad pa ma @119b mchis par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-1: gzha' dkar nag gis bkris pa ma lags pa'i mtshan ma ston par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-2: skar mda' ltung zhing sa g-yo bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-3: khron pa'i nang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-5: rlung drag po dus ma lags par 'bab cing ldang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-6: rtag par mu ge'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-7: 'bru rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-8: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra mang pos gtses pas yul mi rnams sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa mang po myong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-9: yul gyi sa phyogs kyang yid du mi mchi zhing mngon par dga' ba ci'ang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-11: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-12: lha brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-13: sngon yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen po rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas mchi ba'i tshe ltas ngan pa'i dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-15: mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig yul skyong zhing rtag par bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-16: skye bo mang po rnams bde ba la 'god par 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:119b-17: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bkum nas rang gi yul khams gtan du rgyas shing ngar bar 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-0: yang dag pa'i bstan pa 'jig rten du gnas nas sdug bsngal gyis gnod @120a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-2: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams nye bar zhi bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-4: yul gyi bdag po de dag gdon mi 'tshal bar mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-7: 'dzin pa dag la yang bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-11: tshad ma mchis pa'i lha'i 'khor gzhan rnams chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur bas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la sman par 'gyur zhing lha gzhan rnams kyang sman yon mchog thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-12: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-13: 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-15: 'di ltar tshangs pa chen pos kyang sems can rnams la rtag par 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos yang dag par bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120a-17: brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-0: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyis kyang bstan bcos mang po @120b bstan to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-4: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong gis bstan bcos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed bstan mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-5: 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-6: thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs nas lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-7: mi'i tshogs rnams kyi ched du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa bkas bshad pa gang lags pa de ni bstan pa de dag dang bsgrun na ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyis ches khyad par du 'phags pas dper bgyir yang ma mchis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-9: 'di'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po ji snyed mchis pa de dag yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten btul nas sems can la bde ba'i dngos po stsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-11: 'khor rnams yongs bsrungs nas sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-13: phas kyi rgol bas gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-14: sdig pa mi dge ba ji snyed pa thams cad thag ring du spong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:120b-15: yul gyi gdon bgegs rnams yongs su bsal nas yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul zhing rtsod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa'i slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-0: de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams so so nas rang gi yul du chos @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-1: kyi sgron ma sbar te mtha' yas pas rnams gsal bar bgyis nas lha'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-2: rang gi 'khor rnams la sman par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-4: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-6: gnod sbyin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-8: yi dvags ci mchis pa thams cad rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-9: rkyen 'di'i dbang gis bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur zhing gzi byin chen po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-10: 'od kyi snang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-11: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-13: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed du rtag par shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-15: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma mchis pa snyed mnyes par bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-16: 'di lta bu'i sman yon tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor las yang dag par 'das pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-17: mkhyen pa chen po brgya byin pas lhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121a-18: dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su spyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-0: mngon par shes pa lnga dang @121b ldan pa'i drang srong las khyad par du 'phags par gyur pas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyi ches lhag par gyur te brjod du ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi ched du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa yang dag par bkas bshad nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul gyi bdag po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-1: mi'i tshogs mang po rnams 'jig rten na chos kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-2: yul yongs su skyong zhing mi rnams gdul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-3: bskul bar bgyi ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa de dag gsal bar khong du chud pa las gyur pa lags te mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus thams cad bde ba thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon 'di dag thams cad kyang ston pa chen po sh'akya thub pas byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-4: thugs rje'i mthus mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel pa las gyur pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-7: rkyen de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di yongs su bzung ste mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-9: bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:121b-11: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis thams cad la sman par bgyid pas de'i slad du mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-0: @122a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-1: khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-3: lha'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-5: gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-7: bla mar byas te bsngags pa brjod pa mthong nas yongs su bsrungs te gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-8: khyed cag rab tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-9: gal te 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar byed na des ni lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-10: mi'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher yang dag par byas pa yin pas sems can tshad med pa snyed la phan btags pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-11: 'di lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de la khyed kyis rtag par bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122a-12: 'di lta bu'i 'khor bzhi po dag rkyen gzhan gyis phan tshun gnod par mi byed par byos la de dag lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-0: sems rang tu dben zhing bde bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par spel nas phyi ma'i mtha' ji srid pa'i bar du sems can la phan 'dogs pa la rgyun chad pa med par byos @122b shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-1: de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-3: bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzugs [?] kyi cho ga mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-4: sems can gang la la zhig yongs su 'dzin par mos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-5: yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-6: bdag gis rtag par bsrungs pas sems can de sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-8: ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-9: gang zhig yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-12: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya; mah'a r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-24: raksha raksha tu; bdag nyid kyi ming brjod par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-25: m'am sarba satva n'am tsa sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:122b-27: sngags 'di 'don pas skud pa dkar po la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste lan re mdud pa re re por nas dpung pa la bcings nas de'i don gdon mi 'tshal bar 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-2: ta ka ra'i phog 'di rnams cha mnyam par gcig tu bsres te sug par pog phor thogs nas bog [?] bsregs te mched par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-3: khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-4: gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas khang pa dben par sngags bzlas te lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag g-yar drang bar bgyi [?] lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-7: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-13: pa ra ma k'a ru ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-19: sngags 'di lan bdun tshang bar bzlas nas de'i rjes la sngags kyi snying po gdon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-20: sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngar dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag bgyis nas lha'i dbang po rnam thos kyi ming nas 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-21: nor rdzas rnams stsol zhing sems can rnams ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-22: ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bde bar stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-23: de ltar phyag bgyis nas de'i rjes la rgyal po rnam thos kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po gdon par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123a-24: yid bzhin gyi bde ba stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-0: de nas lha'i rgyal @123b po rnam thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-2: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-4: tadya th'a; si mi si mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-15: a'atma n'am ni tyan aanta rbh'a tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-16: na mo bee shra ba n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-18: ma no ra tha pa ri p'u ra ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-19: sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngags lan stong tshang bar bzlas nas de'i rjes la khang pa gtsang ma dag tu ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te dkyil 'khor chung du zhig bgyis nas zas ci 'byor pas sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-20: rtag par phog spos dam pa bsregs nas dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-21: sngags kyi snying po snga ma gdugs mtshan du sems dran pa nye bar bzhag nas bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du zlos shing gzhan gyis rig par mi bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-22: de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu sha ni shi zhes bgyi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-23: gzhon nu'i gzugs nye bar bstan te drung du mchis nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-25: bdag gi pha 'dod ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas lan du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:123b-27: bdag dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i don du nor 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-0: de bzhin du stsal bar gsol @124a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-2: de'i tshe sha ni shi tshig de thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-3: slar pha'i thad du mchis nas phal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-5: dge ba spyod pa'i mi zhig sems rtse gcig tu dkon mchog gsum mchod de nor gyis phongs pa'i slad du yab la gsol ba 'debs so zhes bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-7: khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du de la k'arsh'a pa na brgya brgya byin cig ces mchi bar 'gyur te sngags 'don pas de lta bu'i mtshan ma mthong bar gyur na don 'grub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyis nas gcig tu khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du bdug spos bsregs te mchis nyal ba'i khri'i drung du spos kyi sbrog ma cig bzhag nas rtag par nam langs pa'i tshe sprog ma'i nang du nor ci thob pa blta bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-8: rtag par nor thob pa'i tshe de nyid kyi gdugs la spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-10: zhal zas kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing dbul phongs pa rnams la stsal nas bas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-11: bsris te gzhag par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-12: sems can rnams la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-13: snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124a-16: gnod sems kyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-0: gal te zhe sdang skyes par gyur na dngos grub kyi mthu stor bar @124b 'gyur bas rtag par sems bsrungs te zhe sdang bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-2: sngags 'dzin pas rtag par lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-5: 'khor rnams rjes su dran par bgyis te sngags brjod nas rtag par dge ba bcu po de dag gi bstangs te lha de dag bsod nams kyi mthu 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-6: dge ba mang po kun 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-7: byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bar bgyid na lha mang po de dag gis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-8: thams cad rab tu dga' bas lhan cig tu nye bar mchis te sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-10: sngags 'dzin pa de tshe ring zhing lo tshad ma mchis pa snyed du gnas par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-11: ngan song gsum dang rtag tu 'bral zhing rtag par gnod pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-15: smon pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-16: gal te blon thabs 'tshal na'ang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:124b-17: gcan gzan thams cad kyi skad kyang 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-0: gal te sngags 'don pa'i tshe bdag gis @125a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-1: lus mngon sum du mthong par 'tshal bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-3: bco lnga'i gdugs la ras dkar po la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs shig sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-4: tshon sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-5: sku gzugs 'dri ba'i ri mo mkhan po yang bslab pa'i gnas brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-6: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i g-yon phyogs su dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs su bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-7: sangs rgyas kyi g-yas phyogs su rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-10: 'khor rnams kyi gzugs bris nas mchis pa'i stan legs par bshams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-11: me tog sna tshogs bkram nas spos mchog dam pa bsregs te gdugs mtshan rgyun chad pa ma mchis par mar me sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-13: btung ba mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyis gus pa'i sems bskyed de dus su mchod pa bgyis nas sngags gdon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-14: brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-15: bdag g-yar 'dren pa'i tshe sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-16: na ma: shr'i kanth'a ya; bud dh'a y'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-17: na mo bee shra ma n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125a-21: na ma:shr'i mah'a de bi ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-6: sarba satv'a n'am hi ta k'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-8: sh'i ya de b'i pra bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-13: da d'a hi ma ma aa mo ka n'a ma sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-14: dar sha na k'a ma sya darsha nam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-18: bdag gi sngags 'don pa'i mi de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-19: gzhan yang de lta bu'i mchod pa rgyas par bgyis pa mthong bar gyur na byams shing sdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-20: rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas bdag byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-22: dge slong gi gzugs su lus bsgyur nas sug pa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-23: gser gyi snod thogs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas lus kyis gus pa bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-24: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod de sngags 'don pa de la khyod kyis bsams pa bzhin du smon pa rnams 'grub par bya'o zhes mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-25: nags tshal gyi nang du ma snang bar 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-26: rin po che mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-27: skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug cing bkur bar 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-29: dngul la sogs pa'i nor rnams yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:125b-30: sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-2: longs spyod mchog dam pa yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal na'ang bsam pa bzhin du mi [?] 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-3: deng bdag gis re zhig dngos po 'di tsam zhig bstan pa 'das [?] te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-4: gal te'ang gzhan dag yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na'ang thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par 'grub cing rin po che'i gter bas pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-5: yon tan mthar thug pa ma mchis pa yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-7: zla ba dog sa la lhung bar 'gyur yang srid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-8: sa chen po res 'ga' gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-9: bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nam yang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas rtag par yid bzhin gyi bden pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-11: gang la la zhig gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-14: kha ton du 'don pa des sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-15: ngal ba ma mchis par cho ga rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126a-17: deng bdag gis dbul phongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-0: sdug bsngal gyis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du @126b sngags 'di bstan pa phan yon chen po thob nas thams cad phyug cing skyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-1: rang dbang dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-2: bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du gang zag de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrungs te gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-4: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yongs su bzung nas spel bar bgyid pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-5: sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la gom pa brgya tshun chad du 'od kyis kun tu gsal bar bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-6: bdag gis gnod sbyin brgya stong ji snyed mchis pa yang rtag par rim gro bgyid cing ji ltar mos pa bzhin du g-yog bgyid pas yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-7: bdag gis bden tshig smra ba la mi med pa ma mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig dbang du gyur cing mkhyen par gyur pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-8: de'i che lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis sngags 'di smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:126b-11: khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyis dbul phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba dral nas bde ba thob par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-0: mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du rgya cher spel ba'i phyir rig sngags @127a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-3: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-4: bcom ldan zhal ni zla gtsang nya 'dra zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-5: nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bkye dang mtshungs//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-6: spyan ni dag yangs padma sngon po 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-7: tshems dkar gtams pa dper na dung dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-8: bcom ldan yon tan mtha' med rgya mtsho 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-9: rin chen gya nom tshad med bden pa bsags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-10: mkhyen pa'i yon tan chab kyis rtag rgyas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-11: ting 'dzin dam pa brgya stong rab tu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-12: zhabs mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan ni thams cad mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-13: lte ba mu khyud rtsibs stong kun rab mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-14: phyag dang zhabs kyi dra ba kun brgyan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-15: ngang pa'i rgyal bzhin mtshan ni phun sum tshogs//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-16: bcom ldan sku 'od gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-17: rnam dag khyad 'phags dpe zla yod ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127a-18: ri rab bzhin du yon tan kun rgyas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-0: bcom ldan ri rgyal @127b khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-1: mtshan dang dpe byad mkha' bzhin dpag mi rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-2: zla ba stong pas lhag par 'od zer bkye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-3: smig sgyu rgyu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-4: thugs zhen mi mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-5: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-7: gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde mchog 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-8: bla med stobs bcu dag gis rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-9: khyed cag rgyal po bzhi yis rab bsrungs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-10: rab dpa' nur med pa yi sems skyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-11: mdo sde rin chen gya nom zab mo 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-12: sems can thams cad bde ba sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-13: sems can de dag bde bar gyur pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-14: rtag tu 'dzam gling rab tu spel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-15: stong chen 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-16: sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-17: yi dvags dud 'gro sems can dmyal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-18: sdug bsngal 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-19: 'dzam gling 'di gnas pa yi rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-20: gzhan yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-21: mdo sde'i mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-22: nad mang sdug bsngal bsal bas chom kun med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:127b-23: yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-0: rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-2: gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-3: cho rigs btsun zhing nor ni gnyer ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-4: yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-5: sems la bsams bzhin thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-6: pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni zlog byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-7: rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-8: mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-9: sdug bsngal mang spong mya ngan 'jigs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-10: rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-11: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-12: mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-13: rgyal po dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-14: dper na rab dang chu ni grang mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-15: skom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-16: mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-17: bsod nams mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-18: mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb mdog na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-19: longs spyod sems la bsams bzhin 'byor pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-20: mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-21: bsod nams bsam bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-22: lha yi bdag po khyod dang lha tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-23: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la mchod par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-24: gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128a-25: shes rab gzi byin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-0: da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs @128b pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-1: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni srung dgongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-2: klog 'don 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-3: legs so ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-4: gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-5: lus dang sems ni dga' rangs mgu ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-6: rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-7: gang du gnas pa der ni de srung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-8: 'jig rten khams 'di'i lha ni mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-9: de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-10: thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-11: rab dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang med;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-12: gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-13: mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-14: mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-15: gnod pa rab spong snang pa 'phel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-16: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-17: dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:128b-19: bdag cag gis ni sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma blags te dus nas lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g-yo bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-0: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas lha yi me tog man d'a ra ba @129a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-2: man d'a ra ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-3: khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-5: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas rtag par gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-6: chos smra ba de dag yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pas ye shes kyi snang bas yongs su skyob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-7: gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-8: don bskyud pa zhig mchis na'ang bdag cag gis de dag rjes su dran zhing mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa stsal nas yongs su rtogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-10: mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129a-11: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-0: sems can tshad med pa snyed shes rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongs su bsdus te mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par @129b gyur pas bstan bcos sna tshogs la rab tu mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-1: nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas phyir mi ldog par gyur pas myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-2: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-3: rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-4: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-8: chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-9: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-10: 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-12: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-14: gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:129b-21: gnas ma lags pa'ang ma lags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-1: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-3: khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-5: khyed kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-6: gnas yod pa'ang ma yin phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-9: chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-12: da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-14: dngos po ma yin pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-16: rkyen ma yin pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-18: 'du byed ma yin pa'ang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-20: chos 'gag par 'gyur ba'ang med mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-21: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin te gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-22: yang dag pa'i lam gyi tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-23: mthu stobs rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-0: sangs rgyas rnams @130b kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-2: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-4: bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-5: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas gnas ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-6: rang bzhin gyi spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-7: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po thob nas 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:130b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131a-0: gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing bkur sti byed pa @131a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131a-4: gang zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas len pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131a-9: rkyen des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131a-33: gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131b-12: gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131b-13: zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131b-14: gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di la ni tha na tshig gcig tsam yang dag par gzung ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ches rab tu mang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:131b-17: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-0: 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas @132a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-1: thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par mos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-2: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-9: de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132a-14: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132b-0: so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas rig sngags @132b mnyan par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132b-5: nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu te kvang zhes bya ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:132b-16: ni mi ni mi ni mindha ri ain drestree lo ka /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:133a-14: de nas gzungs sngags smras pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:135b-22: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di g-yar kha nas brjod par bgyid dam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136a-7: mi la gnod bgyid pa'i stag dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136a-16: gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems la bsams pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136b-1: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo 'khor mang po nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nas /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136b-4: bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs par [?] bgyid do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136b-7: tshig gi don bskyud pa zhig mchis na'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136b-8: thams cad dran bzhin legs par khong du chud par bgyis nas gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:136b-10: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-4: tshe 'di nyid la'ang tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-6: bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-7: sems can gzhan yang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman la sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad par 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-8: des de dag la gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa ci mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-9: dang po btsas pa'i skar ma dang phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137a-21: 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-0: bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi bar bgyid @137b pas blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyis te des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan ba sum cu rtsa gnyis po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-2: shu dag gi wad [?] dang ni spri ka spos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-3: gla rtsib bla dag dang shi ri sha; ;aindra hasta sha ma ka sha mi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-4: thang chu dang ni shing tsha gla sgang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-5: aa ga ru dang tsandan ta ka ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-6: sa la ki dang gur gum ha la sa [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-7: na tra smig bcud su ki ma le dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-8: thang shing pa tra dang ni aon sha la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-9: sa la ke dang spra ba gu gul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-10: yungs kar go snyod n'a ga ge sa ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-11: sardza ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-12: skar ma rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-13: spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-14: sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-21: na le dza na kar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-27: si ke na ku tra ku ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-29: bi la ka bi la ma ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-32: sandhi dhu dhu ma ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-37: gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgyid 'tshal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-38: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-39: rab tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-40: don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:137b-41: ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-0: steng du me tog kun tu dgram par @138a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-2: gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-3: ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-4: dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-5: skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin bsrung du stsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-6: gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus ni rab brgyan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-7: so sor grva rer chab kyi bum pa thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-8: der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-9: dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-10: dkyil 'khor de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-11: ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldis mdzes par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-12: dkyil 'khor nang du me long gsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-13: ral gri rnon po mda' bzhi gzhag par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-14: dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhod khung cher stsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-15: 'dzeg pa'i shing leb [?] 'di yi steng du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-16: snga ma'i phye ma chab dang sbyar nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-17: dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhag par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-18: de ltar bkram zhing rnam par bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-19: de nas sngags bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-20: mtshams bcad pa yi sngags ni 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-22: aa ka ra ke na ya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-23: hi li mi li gi le /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-25: de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-26: dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-27: nyi shu rtsa gcig chab bsngags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138a-28: phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-0: de nas @138b spos chab dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-1: brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-2: ngos bzhir yol bas bskor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-3: dre 'og lus ni bkru bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-5: spos chab la gdab pa'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-8: sa ga de bi ga re [?]/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-9: bi ga ta ba ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-10: khrus bgyis lags nas khrus bgyis ba'i chab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod par bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-12: btung ba ci mchis pa gtsang po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-13: rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-14: de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-15: dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-16: sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi dam rgya chen po slad du stsal nas sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-18: rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-19: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-20: sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal nyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-21: sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-22: khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:138b-23: gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-1: rtag par sems ni mi g-yeng bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-2: rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-3: nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-4: dbul phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-5: phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-6: mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-7: bkra shis rab bde bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-8: ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad sel ba bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-9: de'i 'og tu lus bsrung ba'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-16: s'a ga ra sam bud dh'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-17: skan dha m'a t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-21: hi ma ban ddha sam bhu t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-22: aa ni bi la b'a ka t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-23: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-25: na ma:sa ra sva styee mah'a de byee sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-26: sid dhyan tu mantra pa d'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-29: prahm'a nu ma n+ya tu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-30: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-0: dge @139b bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-3: yi ger bris nas spel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-4: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-11: dge slong ma'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-12: bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i rol mo bgyis nas de'i thad du mchis te yongs su skyob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-13: bsrung bar bgyis nas nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-17: 'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-18: rgyal po'i khrims kyis gzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-20: 'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-21: byang stems thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-22: mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-23: nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongs su bzlas nas byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol ba gsan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:139b-25: lha mo sbobs pa chen mo la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-0: khyod kyis sems can tshad med cing mtha' med @140a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-1: pa dag la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-2: bde ba bya ba'i phyir ched du rig sngags de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-3: spos chus khrus bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-5: legs so zhes sngags pa brjod nas khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal bo mchog dam pa 'di bsrungs nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-6: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-7: de nas bram ze koondin+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-8: shes gsal rab dpa' spobs pa'i lha mo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-9: lha mi'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-10: grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-11: sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-12: ri rtse mthon po gnas mchog dag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-13: rtsva bsdus khyim byas de na rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-14: rgyun du rtsva 'jam mdud nas gos byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140a-15: rtag par rkang pa ya gcig bkur ste 'greng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-0: lha 'khor mang po thams cad @140b 'dus lhags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-1: thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-2: shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-3: tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-4: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo nges gsol ba btab pa mnyan nas gzungs sngags smrus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-16: aa ghri ta ma ghri tatsa tsi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-31: aa pra ti ha ta bud dhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-35: pra ti gr'i h'a na ma ska r'a na bdag gi ming brjod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-48: bi tsa ro; bi tsa to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-69: ba ru na sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-70: ye lo ke sa tya sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:140b-71: te sha ma sa tye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-6: na mo bha ga ba ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-7: mah'a dve ba sa ra sva tya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-10: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas bram ze de la 'di skad ces /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-12: sems can rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-15: shes rab yongs su gnyer nas thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 'dod pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-17: de ltar shes par byas nas cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-18: yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-19: thog mar kho nar gzungs 'di kha ton du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-20: byang zhing nor bar med par bklags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-21: byin gyis rlob cing smon pa rdzogs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-22: dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-23: sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-24: rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-25: de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin lha dbang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-26: 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-27: rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141a-28: rtse gcig yid kyis gus par phyag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-0: dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag @141b tu; ;skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-1: sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-2: ji tsam 'byor pas mchod ba bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-3: sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-4: byams dang snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-5: bcom ldan gser sku shin tu gya nom mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-6: g-yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-7: bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-8: dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-9: de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-10: stong pa nyid brten rab tu bsgom par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-11: bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-12: rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-13: gya nom ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-14: gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-15: bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-16: gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-17: ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-18: yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-19: bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-20: rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-21: bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:141b-22: rtags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-0: chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsung @142a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-2: dper na nam mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-3: bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-4: dran pa nyer bzhag gzhal byed smon rdzogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-5: gal te lha mo spobs chen mchod mthong ngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-6: slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-7: gsang ba'i cho ga 'di blangs sgom byed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-8: bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-9: gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-10: rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-11: bsod nams ye shes yon tan 'phel byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-12: nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-13: nor tshol dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-14: grags pa gnyer ba grags chen thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-15: des 'byung tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-16: nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-17: yon tan tshad med mtha' yas ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-18: sems la bsams bzhin yongs su sdud par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-19: gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod nus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-20: nges par 'grub 'gyur the tshom yongs ma skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-21: gtsang ma'i gnas su gos gsar bgos nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-22: dkyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142a-23: bum pa gtsang ma bzhir ni ro zhim dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-0: me tog pog spos ci 'byor mchod par @142b bya; ;lda ldi ba dan dag dang gdugs bres te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-1: byug spos phye ma kun tu khyab brgyan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-2: sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-3: lha lus mthong bar 'dod na'ang smon bzhin 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-4: lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-5: zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-6: gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-7: rtse gcig sems kyis zhag dgu dran par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-8: nam gyi cha smad 'on kyang ma mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-9: gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan dag btsal nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-10: lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-11: mchod gnas bzlas brjod sems kyis mi btang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-12: nyin mtshan le lo sems ni mi bskyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-13: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs mthar thug med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-14: rnam smin gang thob skye dgu smin byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-15: smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-16: gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-17: yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-18: rab brtson gsol 'debs sems ni mi g-yo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-19: lha yi mig dang gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-20: de nas bram ze koondin+yas de skad ces bstan pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-21: dga' dgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'khor mang po rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:142b-24: mi yi 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-0: @143a *// sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas lha mo spobs pa mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa brjod pa nyon cig ces smras nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-1: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-2: 'jig rten dag la dbang phyug thob 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-3: lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-4: deng bdag gtso mo de la bsngags pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-5: sngon gyi drang srong ji skad bstan pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-6: bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-7: sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yod grags dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-8: ma ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-9: rab dpa' rtag par brtson 'grus chen po spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-10: 'thab mo'i g-yul du rtag par rgyun du rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-11: rab dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-12: da ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-13: gos su rtag par dar tshon sngon po gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-14: sdug dang mi sdug byad bzhin kun dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-15: mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu dngangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-16: spyod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-17: phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yongs su sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-18: res 'ga' ri brag zab mo dag na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143a-19: res 'ga' brag phug gtsang po'i 'gram na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-0: res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal @143b chen por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-1: lha mo phal cher 'di dag kun tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-2: ri dang nags tshal mi rgod ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-3: rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-4: rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan ba dan byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-5: dus su mchog tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-6: stag dang seng+ge spyang kis rgyun du bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-7: gnag lug bya la sogs pas rten yang 'cha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-8: dril chen bsgrags nas sgra ni phyung bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-9: bin dha'i ri la sgra ni kun tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-10: res 'ga' rtse gsum tri sh'ul thogs byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-11: g-yas g-yon rgyun du nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-12: zla ba nag po'i tshes dgu bcu gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-13: de yi dus su rtag par mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-14: res 'ga' ba su lha chen srid mor ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-15: g-yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par snying yang brtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-16: sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-17: lha mo mchog tu gyur pas bdas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-18: res 'ga' ba rdzi bu mo dga' mor ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-19: lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-20: 'jig rten dag na yun ring gnas par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-21: rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-22: bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-23: sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-24: drang srong nang na rang dbang dag dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:143b-25: sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-1: bu mo la sogs 'dus pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-2: rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges bar der yang 'du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-3: klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshogs kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-4: gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-5: bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-6: tshig byung dper na 'jig rten bdag po 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-7: rgyal po'i gnas na padma dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-8: chu bo'i 'gram na gnas tshe gru zam bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-9: byad bzhin sdug mdzes zla ba nya ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-10: mang thos phun tshogs gnas dang rten yang byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-11: spobs pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-12: dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-13: lha ma yin la sogs te lha tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-14: thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-15: lag stong brgya byin lha yi dbang pos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-16: gus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-17: sems can gang zhig re zhing tshol ba yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-18: de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-19: yid myur spobs dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-20: sa chen steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-21: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu; ;mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-22: tha na lha 'dre gcan zan dag la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144a-23: de bas bsams bzhin thams cad rdzogs byed 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-0: bud med rnams @144b kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-1: sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-2: lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags spongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-3: 'jig rten bdag po che bzhin bden tshig smra //
