K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-5: 'dod khams lha yi khang pa kun bltas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-6: lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-7: sems can mchog tu gyur pa yongs mi snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-8: gal te g-yul 'gyed 'jigs pa'i gnas dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-9: me dong lhung ba dag ni mthong gyur tam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-10: chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-11: 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-12: gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-13: gal te sha chags gsod par byed pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-14: sems ni rtse gcig mi g-yo gnas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-15: nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-16: dge sdig mi kun yongs su skyob pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-17: byams dang snying rje'i brtse ba rtag mngon snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-18: de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtse gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-19: lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-20: de nas bram ze des sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-21: bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-22: 'jig rten gtso la phyag 'tshal gus phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-23: mi rnams nang na kun gyi mchog gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:144b-24: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-2: yon tan dam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-3: mig yangs padma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-4: bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags pas rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-5: dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-6: deng bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-7: sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-8: yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-9: padma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-10: lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-11: mtshan mang ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-12: dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-13: dran pas kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-14: ji ltar seng+ge gcan zan mchog gyur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-15: rtag par lag pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-16: so sor mda' gzhu ral gri sta re dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-17: tho rangs lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-18: rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nya ba 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-19: tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-20: sems can gang zhig sems la smon yod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-21: skyes bu dam pas bsams bzhin rdzogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-22: brgya byin lha mang kun gyis khyod mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-23: thams cad bsngags brjod skyabs su 'gro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145a-24: bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan skyed byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-0: @145b dus rnams kun tu gus pa bskyed par byed sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-1: gal te spobs chen lha mo gsol 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-2: sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-3: nang par rnam dag sems kyis rtse gcig gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-4: bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsams bzhin 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-6: khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde ba sbyin pa'i ched du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-7: lha mo de la sngags pa brjod pas byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab nas bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ba legs so zhes bka' stsal to ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-8: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal pa mdo sde'i rgyal po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-10: de nas bram ze koondin+yas gong du bstan pa de lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-11: sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-12: khyed cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol ba btab nas snying brtse bas byin gyis brlabs nas tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-14: tshig la shin tu mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-15: shes pa rgya chen po thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:145b-16: 'bel ba'i gtam gyi phan tshun lan 'debs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-1: 'bru'i rgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-2: sems rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-12: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden tshig mngon par grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-13: dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-14: mi slu ba'i tshig gsung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-15: bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung zhing yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-16: mi bden pa'i tshig mi gsung ba'i phyir yangs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nas nyid kyi zhal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-21: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par g-yogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-0: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu sel bar mdzad pa la gus pas @146b phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-1: sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la gus pas phyag btsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-2: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par smon nas sems rtse gcig tu srog phrogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-5: rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-6: zhugs bzhi 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-8: drang srong lha yi spobs pa dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:146b-9: tshangs 'khor drang srong spobs pa dam pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-5: bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-6: bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing 'tshal bas gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de khang pa gcig gtsang mar byas nas ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-7: bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas lus legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas byug pa dam pas byugs te khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-8: bdag gi ched du gdugs re zhing dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-9: mdo sde 'di'i mtshan nas brjod par sems bskyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:151b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bee d'urya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-0: gser gyi ri bo chen po me tog snang ba dpal gyi ri yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod nas me @152a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-2: spos rnams thogs te zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-7: btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-10: btung ba dag thogs te phyogs gzhan du gtor nas 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-11: yang dag pa'i bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-12: ci gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-13: gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun pa ma lags na gsol ba btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-14: de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas brtse ba'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-16: 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-17: de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g-yar drang bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-18: sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152a-20: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-0: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud can la phyag @152b 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-1: sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-2: sangs rgyas gser tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-3: sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-4: sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-5: sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-6: sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-7: sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-8: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-9: lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-10: nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-11: byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-12: byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-14: byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu bshums la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-16: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:152b-17: byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-1: la gus pas phyag bgyis nas de'i rjes la sngags bzlas te dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bdag g-yar 'dren par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-2: sngags 'di'i mthus yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-3: dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-8: mah'a bi h'a ra ga ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-11: mah'a k'arya pra ti pr'a ba ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-12: satv'a aartha sa ma t'a nu pra p'u re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-20: sa m'artha aa nu p'a li ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-22: gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung nas bdag g-yar 'dren par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-23: bdag gis g-yar 'dren pa thos nas de'i thad du mchis te smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-25: 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i tshig ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'grub pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-26: yang dag pa'i tshig slu ba ma mchis pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-28: sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153a-29: gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-0: 'don pa @153b des gdugs mtshan [?] 'dun [?] gyi bar du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas snga dro'i dus kyi tsha sngar so shing bcas te dag par bkrus nas slad snga dro'i dus kyi [?] tshe sngos [?] dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-1: me tog dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-2: sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-3: khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-4: yang na dben pa'i gnas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-5: dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-6: ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas tsandan bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-7: stan mchog gcig bting ste ba dan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-9: me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste sems rtse gcig tu sngags snga ma bzlas nas bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-10: bdag de'i tshe de la rjes su sems shing lta bar bgyid pas de'i khang par zhugs te stan la mchis nas de'i mchod pa len par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-11: de slan chad mi des g-yar lam na bdag mthong bar 'gyur bas ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:153b-12: ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-2: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang rung ste ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-3: ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-12: gos rnams yid bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-13: bde ba'i longs spyod mchog la yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-14: de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang skal ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la'ang stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-15: chos kyi 'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-16: btung ba rnams sbyar te spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-17: me tog gcal du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-18: mchod par bgyis nas mchod par bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa btsongs te rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyis na bdag nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu der gnas nas gang zag de la bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-19: phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154a-20: smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-0: dus dus su dbul phongs pa @154b rnams la'ang stsal bar bgyi zhing bdag gcig pu'i ched du ser snas phangs par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-1: rtag par mdo sde 'di bklags nas rgyun chad pa ma mchis par mchod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-2: bsod nams ci mchis pa de'ang thams cad la yang gtong zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas 'khor ba la nges par 'byung zhing myur du rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur bar smon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo khyod kyis de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-4: gzhan gnyis ka la phan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-5: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-6: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-7: dpal gyi lha mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-8: de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-10: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:154b-11: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe gal te grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-4: nags tshal dag na'ang rung ste mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-6: bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-9: yongs su bskyab par bgyis te rgya cher spel bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-10: sa phyogs gang yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i mkhan po'i ched du khri mthon po btsugs te mdo sde 'di 'chad par byed na bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi 'da' bar bgyis nas der mchis te de'i rkang pa nas spyi bos 'degs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-11: bdag chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-12: chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas mgu ba tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-13: bdag de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis sa chen po 'di'ang dpag tshad brgya phrag brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud thams cad rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155a-14: rgya mtsho bzhi tshun chad kyi sa chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing rab tu gshin pas sngon bas kyang lhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-0: ched khyad par du 'phags par @155b bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-1: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-13: 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyibs mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-14: mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-16: dri phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-17: longs spyod du rung bar bgyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-18: sems can gang gis bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-19: btung ba mchog de lta bu de dag la longs spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-21: dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-22: bro nad rnams mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-23: sems kyi shes rab dpa' zhing rtsol rngo thogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-25: sa chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongs su spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya stong ji snyed pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-28: rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling rnams rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-29: mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:155b-30: gnod pa rnams ma mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-2: sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas gang du gnas kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-3: thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-6: bla mar bgyi zhing bsngags pa brjod par smon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-8: chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag gang du chos 'chad pa'i gnas der yang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-9: sems can rnams kyi ched du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'chad par gsol ba gdab par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-12: mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-15: dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-16: byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon bas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-18: bdag sa'i lha mo brtan ma'ang chos kyi ros tshim par gyur pa'i dbung gis 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156a-19: snga ma bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad bde ba myong bar bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-2: de'i tshe sems can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin gsab pa'i slad du bdag cag gdon mi za bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-5: bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o snyam du bsam par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-6: de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-10: dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchis te chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-11: mdo sde 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gnas su mchis te rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-13: bdag cag deng shin tu brab [?] cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thos pas 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed yongs su bsdus par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:156b-14: mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-0: ma 'ongs pa'i cho rabs brgya stong gi @157a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-1: bar du'ang rtag par mtho ris dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-2: mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-3: de'i chos [?] po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gnas su mchis nas skye bo mang po rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe gcig tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-5: sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcig tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-8: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-9: yang na tshig gcig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par bgyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-10: tha na mdo sde 'di'i mtshan tsam zhig brjod par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-12: sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-13: sa chen po las skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas par 'gyur bas sems can rnams shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157a-16: sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-0: rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum @157b la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-1: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-3: sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na'ang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-4: lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-5: sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir khang khyim dag rab tu brgyan nas bla re gcig bre bar byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-6: pa dan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na rgyu de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-7: rkyen des lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-8: so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-9: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:157b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-0: rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la @158a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-1: zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-2: bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongs su srung zhing skyob par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-3: rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas chos kyi stan gyi drung du mchis te de'i rkang pa la 'degs par bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-5: mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ni sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-6: sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag ni slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-7: mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-8: sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-10: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-11: de nas bcom 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158a-13: bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-0: mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams @158b cad la bde par bgyid pa mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-3: 'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig bdag gis lus yang dag par mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-4: ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-9: tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-10: sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-11: phyir rgol ba'i dgra pha ma par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-12: tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-13: lus bkrus te gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas rts'a bting ba'i steng du mchis te ring bsrel dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-14: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-15: yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa bsregs te me tog gtor nas bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-16: btung ba dag gis mchod pa bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-17: zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na g-yar 'dren pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:158b-25: ba ri sha ba ri sha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-1: 'di 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag g-yar 'dren par bgyis na bdag gis de'i ched du g-yar 'dren pa der mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-4: sems can gang la la zhig bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyi bar 'tshal na'ang snga ma bzhin du cho ga bshams nas gzungs 'di bzlas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-10: ku ru ba re sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-12: gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags snga ma'ang 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-13: bdag gdon mi 'tshal bar lus mngon du bstan nas des ji ltar smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas nam yang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-14: gal te sngags 'di 'don par 'tshal na sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159a-18: ta ti ku kutti p'u ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-0: sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs nas sngags la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dpung pa g-yon pa la bcings @159b pa [?] slan [?] chad lus bsrung bar bgyis pas 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-1: gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par byed na bsams pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-2: bdag sho be mi mchi ste bdag gi dpang du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-4: dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum bzhugs pas med pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-6: khyod yang dag pa'i bden chig [?] gi sngags kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-7: chos smra ba dag la yongs su bsrung bar byas pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-10: rkyen 'dis khyed bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-11: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-12: sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-13: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:159b-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-0: @160a *// thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-2: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-3: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe grong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-11: dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu'ang rung ste yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-13: bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-14: chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spangs te rtag par bde ma myong bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-18: bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160a-19: tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-0: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid @160b dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-1: mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas gus par rim gro dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-3: mchod par bgyid na bdag gis yongs su bsrung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis ste sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-5: ci'i slad du bdag gi ming yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-6: rkyen gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te bdag gis chos rnams rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-7: bdag gis chos thams cad kyi ji snyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-8: chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-9: chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-11: bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-13: 'di ltar chos rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-14: bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-15: bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:160b-16: bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-0: bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes spyod yul @161a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-1: rnams mngon par rtogs par gyur pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-3: bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-4: yang dag par gsal bar rtogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-5: yang dag par khong du chud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-6: yang dag par so sor rtogs par bgyid pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-9: rkyen de'i slad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-11: mdangs ba spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-12: lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-13: gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-14: dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-15: yang dag par dran pa thob nas spa gong ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-16: de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing nyams pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161a-17: dbang po rnams bde zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-0: rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas bsod nams kyi las mngon par @161b sgrub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas sems can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-1: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing slad ma'i dus kyi tshe'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-2: mi'i bde ba myong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-3: rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-4: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-7: bdag la gzungs mchis te sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis bshad par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:161b-14: na ma shtsa turmah'a r'a dz'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162a-18: shi kha ra shi kha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162a-22: gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162a-28: rin po che ngo mtshar ba dag gi rim gro bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162a-36: rgyan phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na'ang bdag gi thams cad sbyar nas ji ltar smon pa bzhin du rgud cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162a-37: rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-0: bdag myur du de'i thad du mchis nas thogs pa ma mchis par yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do; ;sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe cho ga ci rigs par bgyis nas thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzugs 'phang du chag bzhi lnga tsam mchis @162b pa; sug par dgra sta thogs pa ri mor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-1: gzugs brnyan de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas bum pa bzhi sbrang rtsi'i chab bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-2: bu ram gyi chab kyis bkang ste bzhag nas byug spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-6: phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du thab gcig bgyis te de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-9: yungs kar bsregs te snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags lan re zhing lan gcig bsregs na bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rang nyid drung du mchis nas lus mngon du bstan te sngags 'don pa'i mi de la khyod ci dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-11: yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de smros shig ces 'dri bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-12: bdag gis ji skad mchi ba bzhin yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-16: yang na lha'i drang srong du gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:162b-17: lha'i mig gis mngon par shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-1: la yid bzhin du rang dbang thob nas nyon mongs pa bcad de myur du rnam par grol ba thob pa la dgod par 'tshal na'ang thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-3: khyod kyis 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-4: yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs nas bsod nams kyis mtha' yas pa rnams la phan btags pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-6: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-7: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-8: de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163a-10: yul rnams su mi'i rgyal po bgyid pa la gal te yang dag pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur na yul skyong zhing skye bo mang po rnams kyang gso ba'i rngo mi thogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-0: bdag @163b nyid kyang yun ring du khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs la gnas par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-3: thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag la rgyal bas chos yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa'i don gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-4: de nas mi'i rgyal po rnams chos 'di thos pa'i dbang gis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-5: khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs gtan du bde zhing zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-6: yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la'ang sman par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du sa'i lha mo brtan ma la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-9: sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-10: rgyal po de la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:163b-11: spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon par de nas rgyal po yab kyis mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so; ;rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lha'i bdag po'i man ngag ces bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-0: nga sngon spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas yul gyi bdag po byas @164a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-1: pa'i tshe nga'i yab shes pa'i stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas nga la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas ngas bstan bcos 'di la brten nas lo nyi khri'i bar du yul legs par bskyangs te ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du'ang chos ma yin pa spyad par bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-2: deng khyod kyang de bzhin du chos ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-3: ci'i phyir rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-4: khyod deng legs par nyon cig dang khyod la deng legs par bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-5: de nas de'i tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog gis rgyal bu de la tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis yang dag pa'i bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-6: ngas ni sems can bde bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:164a-7: 'jig rten the tshom bcad pa dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:168b-15: rtag par yang dag chos bsten nas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-15: rab brtan gzi byin mthu stobs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-16: mdo sde 'di yi mthu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-17: chos kyi ro yis rtag tshim pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-18: sa bcud thur du song ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-19: dpag tshad brgya ni yan chad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-20: sa bcud gyen du 'phags byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-21: sa chen 'di ni snum par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-22: sa yi rngams su dpag tshad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-23: 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-24: rdo rje'i gzhi la thug pa'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-25: sa bcud thams cad gyen du 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-26: mdo sde rgyal po 'di thos dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-27: bsod nams phung po che thob pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-28: lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-29: thams cad phan yon thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-30: gzhan yang lha tshogs mang po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176a-32: rab dga' rtag tu bde byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-0: nyams pa'i mtshan @176b ma spong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-2: nags tshal 'bras bu lo tog lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-3: mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-4: sems ni rtag tu dga' thob pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-5: lo tog thams cad legs 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-6: kun tu me tog dam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-8: sa chen kun tu rgyas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-9: 'bras bu'i ljon shing mang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-10: kun dga' nags tshal mang po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-11: thams cad lo tog mchog skyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-12: dri zhim rtag par kun tu 'thul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-13: rtsva mang ljon shing rnams las kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-14: me tog dam pa skye 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-16: thams cad kun tu gang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-18: klu yi bu mo tshad med snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-19: rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-20: thams cad kun tu zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-21: me tog rnam pa du ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-22: de bzhin padma dkar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-23: padma sngon po dmar po gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-24: skyes nas rdzing kun gang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-25: mdo sde 'di yi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-26: nam mkha' gang zhig sgrib ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-27: sprin dang khug rna yongs su sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-28: mun nag thams cad snang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-30: dri med 'od ni rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-31: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dri yi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-32: gling bzhi yongs bskor gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:176b-33: mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-0: lha yi bu rnams bstangs pas @177a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-1: na; ;thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-2: gzhal med khang ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-3: nyi zla dang po 'char ba'i che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-4: gling 'di mthong na rab dga' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-5: rtag par snang ba chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-6: thams cad kun tu gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-7: sa chen 'di la yod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-8: padma'i rdzing ni ji snyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-9: nyi mas dus bzhin gsal byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-10: kha ni mi 'byed gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-12: me tog 'bras bu sman rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-13: thams cad legs shing smin 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-14: sa chen kun tu gang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-15: mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-16: nyi zla snang bar byed pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-17: rgyu skar tshad las mi 'da' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-18: rlung char dus bzhin ldang 'bab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-20: yul rnams lo legs skyid par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-21: gang na mde sde 'di bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-22: phyogs gzhan dag las khyad par 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-24: gang du spel zhing 'don pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-25: rnam phye 'chad par byed pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-26: bsod nams gong du thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-27: de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177a-28: lha la sogs pa mang po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-0: thams cad rab tu dga' bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par byed pa @177b de dag la sems rtse gcig tu yongs su bsrungs nas mya ngan gyi gnod pa med cing rtag tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur bas mos par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-1: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-3: gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs su bsrung zhing 'dzin par byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-5: de yi bu gnyis po dngul gyi tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-6: dngul gyi 'od ces bya ba gnyis po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-7: de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu mchog tu rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa dang lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas chos bshad pa nyan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:177b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-0: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed @178a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-1: 'das pa na gser 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-8: bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-12: rin po che'i ri bo'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur nas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-14: de'i tshe 'di'i bu chen po dngul gyi tog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu gyur te de'i tshe de'i ming bsgyur nas rnam dag tog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178a-21: bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @178b gser tog 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-1: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-2: 'di'i bu chung du dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams da nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa; dgra bcom pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-9: bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-13: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis skyes bu chen po gsum po de dag las lung bstan pa'ang thos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-14: 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di'ang thos pas sems rab tu dga' ba skyes nas rnam par dag cing dri ma med par gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-16: nam mkha' lta bur gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:178b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su smin pa thugs kyi mkhyen pas byang chub chen por lung bstan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-0: lha'i bu khyed cag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig @179a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-1: 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i tog mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-3: ming mthun par 'gyur bas thams cad zhal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-5: autpa la'i dri'i ri mo zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-6: mtshan rnam pa bcu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te 'di ltar rim bzhin du sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-9: lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas chos nyan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags na ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179a-10: bdag gis ni lha'i bu 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas dka' ba spyad de lag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-22: gsos sman dag sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'ang ma thos te byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad ma mchis [?] pa gzhan dag ni mchod pa'i yo byad mang pos 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa snyed la mchod pa bgyis nas 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed lon nas gdod de'i rjes la byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-24: lha'i bu 'di dag rgyu rkyen ni gang spyod pa mchog ni ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ji lta bu zhig bskrun na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-26: lha'i gnas de nas 'dir mchis te yud tsam zhig chos thos pa nyid kyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bkas bshad de the tshom gyi dra ba bcad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:179b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-2: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te 'di dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog dam pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-4: nan tan brtson 'grus kyi dka' ba bsgrubs nas gdod lung bstan pa thob pa yin pas lha'i bu mang po 'di dag lha'i gzhal med khang mchog dam pa nas 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba spangs te ched du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di mnyan du 'ongs pa yin pas chos thos par gyur nas kyang mdo sde 'di la sems kyis gus pa bskyed de bee d'urya yongs su dag pa ltar skyon gyi dri ma med par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsum po 'di dag la lung bstan pa'i dngos po'ang thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-8: 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe yun ring por yang dag pa spyod pa bsgrubs nas yi dam chen po blangs pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-9: rkyen de'i phyir ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-10: de nas shing gi lha mo des bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-11: rab tu dga' bas mngon bar yid ches par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180a-12: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-0: @180b lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-3: legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-4: lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-5: rkyen gang yin pa deng khyod la bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-7: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas; rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-13: bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-18: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur nas gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi tshe rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:180b-19: rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis pha ma bzhin du mi rnams la rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-0: rgyal po de'i yul na tshong dpon chu 'dzin ces bya ba sman gyi rigs la shin tu mkhas pa shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud pa sems @181a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-1: can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi mthun pa las gyur pa thams cad yongs su skyob cing gso bar byed pa zhig yod do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-3: de'i tshe tshong dpon chu 'dzin de la bu chu 'bebs shes bya ba byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-4: mang po kun gyis mos par blta bar mos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-5: rang bzhin gyi sems myur ba; gtsug lag rnams legs par rtogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-9: grangs rnams mngon par mi rtogs pa gang yang med pa zhig yod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-10: de'i tshe rgyal po de'i yul khams na sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir bar gyur pas tha na dga' ba'i sems cung zad tsam yang med par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-11: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs sems can brgya stong tshad med pa de dag nad kyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-12: snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas 'di snyam du sems can tshad med pa 'di snyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nyon mongs par gyur te bdag gi pha tshong dpon sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas shing shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181a-13: 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa las byung ba'i nad sna tshogs gso bar nus kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-0: rgas ' [?] @181b pas lus kyi nyam chung zhing rmya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-1: 'khar ba la brten nas gdod 'gro bas grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-3: grong rdal rnams su song nas nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams yongs su skyob par byed mi nus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-4: deng sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed ni nad tshabs chen pos thebs pas yongs su skyob par nus pa med na deng bdag pa sman pa chen po'i drung du song la nad gso ba'i sman dpyad gsang ba dris te gal te shes par gyur na grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-6: grong rdal dag tu song la sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gsos te yun ring por bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-7: de nas tshong dpon gyi bus de snyam du bsam nas pha'i thad du song ste rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de tshigs su bcad pa dag gis pha la 'di skad ces dris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-8: bdag ni sems can bskyab pa'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-9: sman dpyad rnams ni zhu lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-10: byams pa'i yab kyis brtser dgongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-11: bdag la bkas ni bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-12: ji ltar lus ni 'jig pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-14: gzhan yang dus ni gang gi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-15: nad mang rnams ni skye 'gyur lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-17: bde ba dag ni mang 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:181b-18: lus kyi nang na me yi mthu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-0: @182a *// nyams shing gnod par mi 'gyur lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-1: sems can nad ni bzhi mchis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-2: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-3: kun 'dus pa yi nad lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-4: de dag ji ltar gso bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-5: gang gi tshe ni rlung nad ldang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-6: gang gi tshe ni mkhris nad slong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-7: gang gi tshe ni bad kan g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-8: gang gi tshe ni kun 'dus skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bus gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-10: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-11: ngas de drang srong snying po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-12: nad gso dpyad la brten nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-13: rim bzhin khyod la rab bstan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-14: legs par nyon la sems can skyobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-15: zla ba gsum ni dpyid kyi dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-16: zla ba gsum ni dbyar zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-17: zla ba gsum ni ston gyi phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-18: zla ba gsum ni dgun zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-19: 'di ni lo gcig las brtsams pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-20: gsum gsum so sor bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-21: gnyis gnyis dus tshigs gcig byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-22: lo gcig dus ni drug tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-23: dang po gnyis ni me tog dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-24: gsum dang bzhi ni tsha ba'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-25: lnga dang drug pa char pa'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-26: bdun dang brgyad pa ston gyi dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-27: dgu dang bcu pa grang ba'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-28: phyi ma gnyis ni kha ba'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-29: de ltar bye brag shes gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-30: 'gal ba med par sman gtang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-31: dus ni 'di dag rjes mthun par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182a-32: zas skom legs par sbyor byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-0: nad mang @182b dag ni skye mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-1: dus tshigs gal te log 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-3: de tshe gsos sman med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-4: nges par nad kyi sdug bsngal skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-5: sman pas dus bzhi shes bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-6: dus tshigs dag kyang shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-7: lus kyi khams bdun rig byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-8: 'gal ba med par zas sman gtong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-9: ro yi khams dang khrag dang sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-10: rus dang rkang dang klad rgyas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-11: nad ni 'di dag zhugs pa'i ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-12: gsor rung mi rung shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-13: nad ni tha dad rnam bzhi yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-14: rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-15: kun 'dus pa yi nad yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-16: g-yo ba'i dus ni shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-17: dpyid ka'i dus ni bad kan g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-18: dbyar ni rlung nad skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-19: ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-20: dgun ni gsum po cig car ldang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-21: dpyid ni tsha rtsub dro ba bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-22: dbyar ni snum dro lan tshva skyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-23: ston ni grang dang mngar dang snum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-24: dgun ni rtsub skyur snum dang mngar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-25: dus ni bzhi po 'di dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-26: sman dang zas skom gang bza' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-27: gal te de bzhin za byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-28: nad mang dag ni skye mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-29: zos 'og na ba bad kan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-30: zhu tshe na ba mkhris las gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-31: zhu 'og ldang ba rlung gi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-32: dus dang sbyar la nad shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-33: nad kyi rtsa ba shes gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-34: nad ni ji bzhin sman gtang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:182b-35: nad dbyibs bye brag tha dad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-2: rlung nad dag la snum bag btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-3: mkhris pa'i nad ni 'khru na bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-4: bad kan nad ni skyug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-5: kun 'dus la ni sman gsum dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-6: rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-7: de ni kun 'dus par shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-8: nad ldang dus ni shes gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-9: rang bzhin dag ni shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-10: de ltar brtags te shes gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-11: dus bzhin du ni sman dpyad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-12: zas skom sman ni 'gal med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-13: de ni sman pa mkhas zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-14: shes pa'i yan lag brgyad rig nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-15: sman dpyad rnams ni kun bsdud pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-16: 'di dag la ni gsal byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-17: sems can nad ni gso bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-18: gtar ba dang ni rmas snad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-19: lus kyi nad dang 'dre gdon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-20: ma rungs dug dang byis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-21: tshe bsring dang ni mthu skyed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-22: sngar ni de yi kha dog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-23: smra tshig rang bzhin rab brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-24: de 'og rmi lam dris gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-25: rlung mkhris bad kan bye brag shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-26: skem rid mgo yi skra ngan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-27: sems kyi rang bzhin mi brtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-28: tshig mang rmi lam 'phur mthong na;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-29: de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-30: gzhon nur skra dkar skye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-31: rngul che gsher ba mang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183a-32: yid gzhungs rmi lam me mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-0: de ni mkhris pa'i rang @183b bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-1: sems brtan lus ni mnyam la drang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-2: zhib rtog mgo dag snum zhing rlan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-3: rmi lam chu dang rdzas dkar mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-4: bad kan rang bzhin shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-5: kun 'dus rang bzhin kun ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-6: kha cig gnyis dang gsum ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-7: phyogs gcig lhag par gang mang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-8: de yi rang bzhin shes par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-9: rang bzhin rig par gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-10: nad bzhin sman ni gtang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-11: 'chi ba'i mtshan ma med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-12: mi de gsor rung ba zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-13: dbang pos log pa la 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-14: bla ma sman pa dag la brnyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-15: nye du dag la khong khro na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-16: 'chi ba'i mtshan mar shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-17: mig yon kha dog dkar 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-18: lce gnag sna zur yo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-19: rna ba'i 'khor lo sngo las gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-20: ma mchu thur 'phyang chi ba'i mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-21: aa ru ra ni rnam gcig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-22: ro yi rnam pa drug ldan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-23: nad ni thams cad sel byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-24: nyes med sman rnams kun gyis rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-25: 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-26: sman rnams nang na rnyed par sla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-27: bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-28: 'di dag nad mang gso bar nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-29: de las gzhan pa'i sman rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-30: nad dang sbyar te bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-31: sngar ni brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:183b-32: nor dang khe la blta mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-2: gces pa'i don ni bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-3: 'di yis sems can gso byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-4: mtha' med 'bras bu thob par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs pha las mngon sum du shes pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi don shes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-7: 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-8: dus tshigs mi mthun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-9: sman dpyad kyi cho ga thos pas legs par khong du chud par gyur nas bdag nyid nad mang po gso nus par rig par gyur pas grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-11: grong rdal kun tu khyab par de dang de dag tu song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-12: nad kyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can 'bum phrag stong du ma de'i thad du lhags pa rnams la legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-16: sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas deng khyed cag gi nad mang po gsos nas thams cad sos par bya'o zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184a-17: rigs kyi lha mo; de'i tshe mi mang po rnams tshong dpon gyi bus legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas nad gso bar gnang ba thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-0: de nas sems can nang @184b tshabs chen pos btab pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed cig tshig de skad smras pa thos nas lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-1: sems dga' mgu ra ngas shing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thos par gyur pas rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-2: rkyen des nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa thams cad sos shing zhi bar gyur pas nyams stobs rtas te snga mkho bzhin du sos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-6: nad kyi sdug bsngal shin tu lci zhing gso bar dka' ba'i sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyang lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du lhags nas yang nad [?] gso bar gsol ba btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-7: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus sman gyi nom pa dag btang nas thams cad sos par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-9: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu des yul khams de kun gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma sos par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-10: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-11: nad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:184b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-0: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sngon gyi rgyal @185a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-1: po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams su sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa dag gsos nas snga mkho bzhin du rtas te bde ba myong bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-2: de'i tshe sems can mang po de dag nad sos par gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi las mang du bsags nas sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba la bdag nyid longs spyod par gyur pas thams cad lhan cig tshong dpon gyi bu'i thad du dong ste thams cad gus pa bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-5: bsod nams kyi dngos po shin tu legs par bskyed de bdag cag la phan btags nas bde bar 'tsho bar byas pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-6: legs so; ;khyod ni yang dag pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-7: snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa dag legs par gsos so zhes grong khyer kun tu khyab par de ltar bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185a-9: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de'i chung ba chu'i padma'i mdzod ces bya ba la bu gnyis yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-0: de gcig gi ming ni chu @185b rgyas zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-1: gcig gi ming ni chu'i mdzod ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-2: de nas chu 'bebs kyis bu gnyis khrid nas mthar gyis grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-4: grong rdal rgyu zhing dong ba las dgon pa'i gnas shin tu nyam nga ba zhig 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-9: bya rgod la sogs pa gcan gzan gyi rnam pa sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba mang po phyogs gcig tu rgyug cing 'phur te dong ba mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de 'di snyam du gcan gzan 'di dag rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-11: rkyen gang gi phyir phyogs gcig tu 'phur zhing rgyug par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-12: bdag gis skad cig phyi bzhin du brtag go snyam du bsams nas phyi bzhin du song ba las rdzing chen po dgon pa skyes zhes bya ba de ni chu zad la thug pas rdzing de'i nang na nya mang po yod pa mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-13: chu 'bebs kyis mthong nas kyang snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-14: de'i tshe shing gi lha zhig lus phyed tsam bstan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-18: khyod ni yang dag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya bas nya 'di dag la snying brtsebs chu sbyin pa'i rigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:185b-20: rkyen rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-0: @186a *// der khyod kyis ming ji lta ba bzhin du byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-1: de nas chu 'bebs kyis shing gi lha mo la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-2: nya 'di dag gi grangs ji tsam zhig yod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-3: shing gi lha mos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-4: grangs ni stong phrag bcu tshang ba snyed yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bus grangs de snyed yod par thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-7: lhag par snying rje'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-8: de'i tshe rdzing chen po de yang nyi mas gdungs nas chu'i lhag ma cung zad cig lus par gyur pas nya stong phrag bcu po de dag kyang 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs te lus kyis 'gre ldog byas pa na tshong dpon de mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-9: sems la re ba dang bcas mig mi 'dzums par rjes su 'brang zhing blta bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-10: de nas tshong dpon gyi bus dngos po de mthong nas phyogs bzhir rgyugs te chu btsal bar 'dod kyang rnyed par ma gyur pas yang phyogs gcig tu rnam par bltas pa las ljon shing chen po zhig mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-11: steng du 'dzegs nas yal ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-12: lo ma bcad de bsil grib byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186a-14: rdzing 'di'i chu gang nas 'ongs zhes yongs su btsal ba las chu bo chen po chu skyes zhes bya ba zhig mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-0: de'i tshe chu bo de'i 'gram na nya pa mang po yod pas nya blang ba'i phyir chu bo de'i gong du g-yang sa chen po @186b yod pa'i gnas su chu bo nas 'bab tu mi ster bas chu dral ba'i gnas de yang shin tu bcos dka' bar gyur pas 'di snyam du gad pa 'di ni shin tu zab cing g-yang sa che bas mi brgya stong gis zla ba gsum gyi bar du'ang gcod par mi nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-1: bdag gcig pus mi nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-2: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu myur du rang gi grong khyer du song ste rgyal po chen po'i drung du phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-3: mgo bos rkang pa la phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-5: bdag gis rgyal po chen po'i mnga' ris na 'bangs la bro nad sna tshogs ci mchis pa gsos nas thams cad bde bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-6: mthar gyi ljongs rgyur mchis pa las 'brog dgon pa zhig tu mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-7: rdzing dgon pa chu skyes zhes bgyi ba de'i chab bas su nye bas de na nya stong phrag bcu mchis pa yang gdugs kyis bskams pas rings po mi thogs par 'gum par 'gyur ba dag mthong lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:186b-10: thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te glang po che nyi shu zhig chab dgal bar skad cig stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-0: ji ltar bdag gis nad pa mang po la srog stsal pa de bzhin du nya de dag gi srog gi skyabs bgyid pa lags so zhes gsol @187a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-1: to; ;de nas rgyal po chen pos kyang blon po chen po la sman pa'i rgyal po 'di la glang po che byin cig ces bsgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-2: de'i tshe blon po chen pos kyang rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas tshong dpon gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-5: khyod bdag nyid glang po che'i lhas su song ste yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du glang po che nyi shu zhig 'dams te khyer la sems can la phan btags nas bde ba thob par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-6: de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis dang lhan cig tu glang po che nyi shu khrid de tshong pa'i khyim nas rgyal ba mang po g-yar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-7: chu dral ba'i gnas su phyin nas rkyal pa chus bkang ste glang po che la bkal nas rdzing gi drung du phyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-8: rdzing gi nang du blugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-9: snga mkho bzhin du gang zhing rgyas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-11: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus rdzing gi ngos bzhir 'khor bar bltas pa dang; de nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang nas 'gram du rgyu bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'di snyam du nya mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187a-13: gdon mi za bar bkres pa'i mes gdungs nas bdag la zas slong ba yin pas bdag gis sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-0: tshong dpon gyi bu @187b chu 'bebs kyis bu la 'di skad smras so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-1: khyod kyis glang po che mchog tu stobs dang ldan pa zhig blangs te myur du khyim du deng la yab tshong dpon la gsol te khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-2: pha ma za ba'i skal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-6: bran pho'i skal ba ci yod pa thams cad kyang bsdus te khyer la shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-7: de nas bu gnyis pas bstan pa mnyan nas glang po che mchog la zhon te rings par khyim du song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-8: mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-9: dngos po gong ma rgyas par smras nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-10: khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa blangs te glang po che la bkal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-11: myur zhing rings par pha 'dug pa'i rdzing drung du phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-12: de nas chu 'bebs bu 'ongs pa mthong nas lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-13: sems dga' mgu rangs par gyur te zas rnams blangs nas rdzing kun tu khyab par gtor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-14: nya rnams zas thob pas thams cad 'grangs shing tshim par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:187b-15: yang 'di snyam du deng bdag gis zas yongs su btang nas nya rnams srog thob par gyur pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe'ang chos kyi zas yongs su btang nas sems can mtha' yas pa rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-1: sngon dgon pa'i nags tshal na dge slong zhig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-2: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo'i don gces pa ston pa yang mthong zhing thos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-4: mdo sde las sems can gang la la zhig 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan thos par gyur na mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-5: deng bdag gis nya stong phrag bcu po de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo yang bstan la de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan yang brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-6: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-7: theg pa chen po la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-8: yid mi ches shing smod par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-9: de dag kyang mngon par yid ches pa'i sems 'phel bar bya'o snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188a-10: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu 'di snyam du bdag rdzing gi nang du zhugs te nya mang po de dag la chos zab mo shin tu gya nom pa bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas chu'i nang du zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-0: dgra bcom @188b pa; yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-5: bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-6: lha dang; mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di ltar thugs dam bzhes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-9: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa gang dag 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-10: nga'i ming thos par gyur na shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to zhes bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-11: de nas chu 'bebs kyis rdzing gi nya de dag la chos zab mo gya nom pa yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-14: 'di skyes pa'i phyir de skye bar 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-16: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-17: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-18: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-19: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
