K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-20: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-21: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-22: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-23: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-24: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-25: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:188b-26: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-4: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-8: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-11: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-12: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-19: rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189a-23: 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-0: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzungs 'di @189b bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-20: sra pra shi ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-30: au pa dhi ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-40: sha ma ni ni sv'a h'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-41: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshong dpon gyi bu'i sngon gyi rgyu 'di bstan pa na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-42: mi'i 'khor rnams shin tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-43: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag so so nas gnas de nyid du mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-44: legs so sh'akya thub pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-45: yan lag bcu gnyis mtshungs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-46: dam chos rig sngags bkas bshad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-47: sdig bsal bsod nams 'phel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-48: bdag cag kyang ni sngags brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-49: dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-50: gang zhig 'gal bar bgyis nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-51: legs par rjes su mi 'brang na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-52: aardza ka yi yal ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-53: mgo ni tshal pa bdun du 'gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:189b-54: bdag cag bcom ldan spyan sngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-15: tu ru tu ru tu ru b'idye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-16: aa dhi siddhi da ba bye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-22: aa su ma bad dhe sv'a h'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-25: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-26: bu gnyis kyis rdzing de'i nya ngag la chu dang; zas byin nas [?] chos bshad de slar rang gi khyim du dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-27: tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de dus gzhan zhig na ston mo la 'dus te ston mo sna tshogs byas nas chang gis ra ro ste nyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-28: de'i tshe nya stong phrag bcu po de dag dus gcig tu tshe 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-29: rkyen gang gis lha'i gnas 'dir skyes par gyur ces bsams nas phan tshun gcig la gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-31: bdag cag ni sngon 'dzam bu'i gling du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su lhung nas nya'i lus blangs pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190a-32: tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bdag cag la chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-1: bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan nas kyang brjod pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-4: rkyen des bdag cag lha'i gnas 'dir skyes pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-5: de'i phyir bdag cag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du dong la drin bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa bya ba'i rigs so zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-6: de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag lha'i gnas de nas mi snang bar gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du sman pa'i rgyal po chen po'i thad du lhags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-7: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de yang thog mthon po'i steng du bde bar gnyid log pa las lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mu tig gi phreng ba stong phrag bcu ni mgo drung du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-8: yang stong phrag bcu ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-9: yang stong phrag bcu ni g-yas logs su bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-10: yang stong phrag bcu ni g-yon logs su bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-11: me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-12: man d'a ra ba chen po'i char pa pus nub tsam du phab nas 'od kyis kun snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:190b-13: lha'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra dbyangs snyan pa dag byung bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gnyid log pa thams cad sad par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-1: dpon gyi bu chu 'babs kyang gnyid log pa las sad par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-2: de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la 'phur te dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-3: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul khams su'ang gnas de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-4: de dag thams cad du lha'i me tog padma dam pa'i char mngon par phab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-5: lha'i bu mang po de dag sngon gyi gnas dgon pa'i rdzing drung du dong nas lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-6: de nas mi snang bar gyur nas slar lha'i gnas su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-7: yid bzhin du ci dga' bar 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-8: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyang nam langs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-9: blon po chen po de dag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-11: rkyen gang gi phyir ya mtshan gyi mtshan ma de lta bu dag snang zhing 'od zer chen po dag kyang bkye bar gyur ces smras so; ;blon po chen pos spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-14: lha'i tshogs mang po rnams kyis tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi sdum par mu tig gi phreng ba 'bum phrag bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-15: me tog man d'a ra ba'i char mngon par phab pa pus nub tsam du bgyis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191a-16: rgyal pos blon po la bsgo pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-0: tshong dpon gyi @191b khyim du song la de'i bu bos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-1: blon po chen pos bka' mnyan nas de'i khyim du song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-3: tshong dpon gyi bul gug [?] go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-4: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-6: rkyen gang gi phyir ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu byung bar gyur ces dris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-7: tshong dpon gyis bus smras pa; bdag gis dpyad pa ltar na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-8: gdon mi 'tshal bar rdzing de'i nang gi nya mang po de dag mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin du tshe 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas de dag drin lan glan pa'i slad du ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu bstan snyam bgyid lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-11: chu 'bebs kyis smras pa; lhas pho nya 'ga' zhig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-12: bdag gi bu gnyis rdzing chen po'i drung du btang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-13: nya stong phrag bcu po de dag gum mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-15: mi mad mkhyen par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-16: rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-18: de'i bu gnyis rdzing de'i drung du btang ba las rdzing de'i nang na me tog man d'a ra ba mang po phung po chen pos gang bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-19: nya mang po thams cad dus las 'das par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:191b-20: mthong nas kyang slar myur du log ste rgyas par rgyal po la gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-0: @192a *// rgyal po'ang de ltar gyur pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas sngon de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-3: khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-4: sngon byung ba tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-5: tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'dzin zhes bya ba de ni mdzes pa'i tog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-6: de'i bu gnyis las bu chen po chu rgyas zhes bya ba de ni dngul gyi tog ces bya ba 'di nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-7: de'i bu chung ngu chu'i mdzod ces bya ba de ni dngul gyi 'od ces bya ba 'di nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-8: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba de byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo khyod nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-9: nya stong phrag bcu po de dag ni lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-10: ngas sngon nya de dag la chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-11: zas byin te tshim par byas nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bshad pa'i rgyu de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud de'i mtshan nas brjod de bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyus mtho ris su skyes par gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-0: deng nga'i thad du 'ongs nas rab tu dga' bas chos mnyan @192b bas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas de dag gi ming bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-2: ji ltar ngas sngon srid pa rnams su 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can tshad med pa snyed la rgya cher phan btags nas thams cad rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyod cag thams cad kyis kyang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis nges par 'byung ba yongs su gnyer nas bag med par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-3: de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-4: thams cad kyis byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-5: snying rje chen pos thams cad yongs su skyo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-6: nan tan brtson 'grus kyi dka' ba spyad nas gdong bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs shing mngon du byed par 'gyur bar khong du chud par gyur pas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-7: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal pos las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-8: tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:192b-9: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po bam po bcu pa ste tha ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la lha'i bu stong phrag bcu @193a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-1: po de dag gi sngon gyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-3: yang byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-4: 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-5: ngas 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' pa'i lam spyod pa na chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-6: zas sbyin pa btang nas nya de dag gi srog la phan btags pa 'ba' zhig byas pa ma yin gyi; shin tu phangs pa'i lus kyang yongs su btang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-8: rkyen gang yin pa lhan cig blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i gnas kyi steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-10: lha'i gnas kyi 'og thams cad na mchog tu rnam par rgyal zhing mchog tu btsun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-11: 'od zer brgya stong du mas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-12: mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-13: yon tan yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa des dge slong rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-14: 'khor mang po rnams dang thabs gcig tu panytsa la'i ljongs su byon nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-15: nags tshal sa gzhi shin tu mnyam la tsher ma rnams med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-16: me tog mchog dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193a-17: rtsva 'jam po dag gis kun tu khyab par bkram par gshegs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan @193b pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-1: khyod kyis shing 'di'i drung du nga'i ched du stan things shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan nas gdan bting ngo [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-3: bting zin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-6: 'phags pas dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan gyi steng du skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-8: yang dag pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-9: khyed cag sngon dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel blta bar 'dod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-10: dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-11: bdag cag mthong bar mos lags so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgyas rab tu brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-13: dpe byad dang ldan pa'i phyag gis sa la bsnun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-14: de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos par gyur pas sa gas shing bye bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-15: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas rab tu brgyan pa zhig mngon par 'phags te byung ba 'khor mang po kun gyis mthong nas ngo mtshar che ba'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:193b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-1: su bskor ba mdzad de slar gdan la bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-2: khyod kyis mchod rten 'di'i sgo phye zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo phye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-4: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgrom bu rin po che mchog dam pas brgyan pa zhig mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-7: rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i sgrom bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig gda' lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan nas phye ba dang ring bsrel kha dog dung dang; me tog ku mu da 'dra ba zhig mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-10: sgrom gyi nang na ring bsrel kha dog dam pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa zhig gda' lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-13: khyod kyis skyes bu chen po'i rus pa 'dir khyer te shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ring bsrel de blangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas dge slong rnams la khyed kyis dka' ba @194b spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bzhag pa la ltos shig ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog ldan blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-2: rab dpa' brtson pas pha rol phyin drug rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-3: rtag sgom byang chub phyir ni rgyun chad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-4: btang snyoms che brtan sems la ngal ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-5: dge slong dag ;khyed cag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus la gus pas phyag byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-6: ring bsrel 'di ni tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-8: shes rab kyi dri tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bdugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-9: bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa yin pas shin tu phrad par dka'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-10: de nas dge slong rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-11: 'khor mang po rnams kyis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-12: mgo bos ring bsrel la phyag byas nas sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdun du 'phags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:194b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa lags pas sems can kun gyis bsnyen bkur bgyi @195a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-3: rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di la phyag mdzad lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-6: nga ni rus pa 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas sngon gyi drin bsab pa'i phyir deng ngas phyag byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-7: yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-10: som nyi gcod pa'i phyir ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-11: rkyen gang yin pa yang dag par bshad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-12: khyed cag legs par yid la byos la sems rtse gcig tu nyon cig ;tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-13: bdag cag shin tu thos par mos lags na rnam par phye ste bkas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-16: yul cig gi rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-18: dmag gi dpung rab tu dpa' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-19: mang po kun gyis bkur zhing ngag nyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-20: rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195a-21: mi rnams ngar zhing rgyas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-0: phyir rgol ba'i dgra med pa zhig @195b yod de btsun mo dam pa byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-1: mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-2: bu chen po'i ming ni sgra chen po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-3: bu 'bring po'i ming ni lha chen po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-4: bu tha chung gi ming ni sems can chen po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-5: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtse zhing ltad mo blta ba'i phyir ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-6: nags tshal kun tu blta bar chas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-7: bu gsum po de'ang phyi bzhin du dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-9: 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir pha spangs te kun tu 'khyam pa las 'od ma'i tshal chen po zhig tu phyin te ngal bsos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-10: de na rgyal bu chen pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-12: deng bdag ni sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-13: nags tshal 'dir gcan gzan ma rungs pa dag gis bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-16: bdag ni rang gi lus la dang po nas phangs pa med na snying du sdug pa 'di dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhig 'byung du dogs so zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-17: rgyal bu tha chung gis phu bo gnyis la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-18: 'di ni lha dang drang srong 'du ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-19: bdag la 'jigs dngangs 'bral ba'i mya ngan med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:195b-20: lus sems kun khyab dga' ba skyes pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-2: de'i che rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems la ci bsams pa'i dngos po dag smras nas mthar gyis mdun du song ba las stag mo zhig bu bdun btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa bu rnams kyis bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-4: skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-5: lus rid cing nyam chung ba ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-8: kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdun lon te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-9: bu bdun gyis yongs su bskor bas zas btsal ba yang mi khom ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-11: skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir bas gdon mi za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so; ;rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-12: stag 'di dag rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig za /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-13: rgyal bu chen pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-15: sha khrag dron mo 'ba' zhig za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-16: de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-17: 'di ni nyam chung sel mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196a-18: rgyal bu 'breng pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang 'di skad ces smras so; ;stag mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-0: bdag cag gis ji ltar rnyed par @196b dka' ba'i zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-2: su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-3: srog spangs nas bkres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-4: skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-5: rgyal bu chen pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-6: spang bar dka' ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-7: rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-8: deng bdag cag ni so so nas rang gi lus la sred cing mngon par zhen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-9: shes rab med pas gzhan rnams la phan 'dogs mi nus kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-10: skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-12: 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med par rul zhing myags te bor bas phan pa ci'ang byas pa med na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-13: ci'i phyir deng mchil snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-14: bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:196b-15: de'i tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-0: stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g-yeng bar bltas nas ring zhig tu bskor te cig char spangs nas @197a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-2: de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-3: bdag gis lus srog btang ba'i dus ni dang yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-5: bdag gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-6: mi gtsang ma nam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-7: yo byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-8: nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang ni; ;'gyur zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-9: rtag tshol dgang [?] dka' bsrung bar rab tu dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-10: rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-11: nams kyang bdag 'dor byas ba'i drin mi shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-13: lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-14: 'jigs su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-15: mi gtsang bas lud dang mtshungs pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-16: deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings chen po byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-17: 'khor ba yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-20: gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na 'di nyid 'bras dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-21: nad ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-22: 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197a-23: lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-0: chu bur lta bur mi brtan @197b pa; ;srin bu mang po 'dus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-1: rtsa rgyus dang rus pa phan tshun 'brel pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-2: shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-3: de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yongs su spangs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-4: bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-5: mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-6: mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-7: 'khrug pha gtan du spangs nas 'khor ba rgyun bcad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-8: nyes pa rnams spangs nas ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-9: shes rab kyi stobs kyis phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas bsod nams brgya stong mang pos brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-10: thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-11: sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa thob par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-12: thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshad med pa gtang bar bya'o snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-13: de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' sran dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-14: smon lam chen po btab nas snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems rtas shing 'phel bar gyur kyang phu bo gnyis skrag cing dngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas smon pa mi 'grub par dvogs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-15: phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis sngar gshegs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:197b-16: bdag re zhig slar mchi 'o zhes smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-0: de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar @198a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-1: tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas stag mo'i drung du phyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-2: gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du bzhag ste smon lam 'di skad btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-3: bdag ni chos mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-4: bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-5: snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed g-yo ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-6: skye bos phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed; ;byang chub nad med gdung ba med pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-7: blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-8: khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-9: deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-10: de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas stag mo ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te nyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-11: snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag mos ci yang byed ma nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-12: byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong pa dang ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzogs te lus bor nas yang 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni nyam chung zhing rmya bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198a-13: mtshon btsal yang ma rnyed pas 'od ma skam po'i tshal bas lkog mar khrag phyung ste mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-0: de'i tshe ji ltar rlung gis chu bo bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu @198b g-yos par gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-1: nyi ma'ang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-2: spos mchog dam pa'i char yang mngon par phabs pas tshal gyi nang du kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-3: de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-4: rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsdags pa brjod de thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-5: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-7: yongs su skyob pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-8: bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-9: rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-10: lus spang phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-11: nges par rtag bde gya nom gnas phyin nas; ;'khor ba'i 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-12: ring po mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-13: nyer zhi bde ba skye med mngon rtogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-14: de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:198b-15: khrag bldags te sha ma lus bzos pas rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-1: bu chen pos sa g-yos pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-3: sa chen ri klung kun kyang rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-4: phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od ma ldan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-5: lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-6: 'di ni nu bos res par lus wangs [?] rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-7: rgyal bu 'brir pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-8: tshigs su bcad de smras pa; stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-9: bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dvogs mthor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-10: sems can chen po smre ba bdag thos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-11: nu bos lus btang deng bdag the tshom 'chal [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-12: de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-13: sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te dus nas gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung du phyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-14: nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-17: khrag babs bas ni rdzab tu gyur nas sa gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-18: brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang gzung ma nus pas rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-19: langs nas lag pa bteg ste rab tu dus nas smre sngags bton pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-20: bdag cag nu bo byad sdug mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-21: pha ma gnyis ka lhag par byams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199a-22: ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-0: lus @199b spangs slar ni ldog ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-1: gal te pha mas dris gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-2: bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-3: lhan cig srog ni btang sla na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-4: rang gi lus ni ci phyir bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-5: de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags bton te dus nas yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-6: de'i tshe rgyal bu tha chung gis khrid pa'i g-yog 'khor rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-7: rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so zhes smras par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-8: de'i tshe rgyal bu'i btsun mo dam pa'ang yang thog mthon po'i steng du nyal ba'i rmi lam na ltas ngan pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-10: nu ma gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-12: phug ron gyi phru gu gsum thob pa las gcig ni khras khyer /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-13: gnyis ni dngangs shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-14: sa g-yos pa'i tshe btsun mo sad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-15: sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas 'di skad du smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-16: ci phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-17: chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-18: nyi ma 'od med g-yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-19: mig 'gul nu g-yo sngon chad yong mi 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-20: snying la mdas phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:199b-21: lus kun rab g-yo bde ba ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-2: nges par sngon med ltas ngan dngos po yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-3: btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las nu zho zags pa dang 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon mi za bar ltas ngan gyi dngos po ston pa yin no snyam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-4: de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do zhes zer ba thos pa dang; sems la shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes nas pho brang gi nang du song ste btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-7: slad rol gyi mi rnams las kun tu so sor rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-8: de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-9: mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te mig mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-11: bdag gis slad rol gyi mi rnams las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-13: bdag gis bu sdug tha chung stor ces mchi ba thos lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-14: rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200a-15: shin tu skrag par gyur pas brnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-0: deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas mchi ma phyis te btsun mo la spro @200b ba bskyed nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-3: khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-4: nged deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal par bya'o zhes smras nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-6: skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste so sor gyis te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nya bar mdun du 'ongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-7: rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-9: rgyal bu mi bzhugs zhes thos pas thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-10: rgyal bu tha chung ni da dung mi gda' lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-11: rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-15: nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-16: dang po bu yod pa na dga' ba chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-17: phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-18: gal te nga'i bus srog ni slar thob na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-19: nga'i lus shi yang sdug bsngal ci yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-20: btsun mos de skad thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-22: mdas phog pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun tu dkris par gyur pas smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-23: bdag gi bu gsum 'khor dang bcas par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-24: nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-25: bu sdug tha chung gcig pu ma 'ongs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:200b-26: nges par 'bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos yod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-1: tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las rgyal pos blon po de la bu sdug gang na 'dug ces pa smros pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-2: blon po 'bring pos de yid la bcags te dus pas lkog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-3: lce yang bskams nas tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-4: bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-5: bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-6: myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-7: bdag gi brang ni de ring gis [?] snyam byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-8: de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-9: btsun mos gtam de thos nas smre zhing mchi mas brnab sa bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i sa phyogs su myur zhing rings par dong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201a-10: 'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su btang ba'i gnas su phyin nas rus pa rnams kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang cig car sa la 'gyel te shi ba dang 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-0: rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po bsgyel ba bzhin du sems rmongs shing dran pa stor bas shes pa ci yang med par gyur @201b to; ;de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-1: btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdod dran pa thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-2: de nas lag pa bteg ste 'dug nas smre tshig smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-4: bu sdug tha chung mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-5: ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-6: gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shi na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-7: 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-8: de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang skra long long por gyur te lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas nya skams la 'gre ba bzhin du sa la 'gres te pha bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smre tshig smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-9: bdag gi bu ni sus gtubs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-10: rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-11: bdag gi bu sdug stor bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-12: mya ngan smre ba rang mi theg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-13: kye hud bu ni sus bsad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-15: bdag snying rdo ni ma yin nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-16: ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-17: bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-18: gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-19: so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-20: deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-21: phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-22: gcig ni khras khyer mthong bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:201b-23: deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-0: ltas ngan ston la mi bden @202a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-1: med; ;de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-2: bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bar btugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus te mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-4: khyod kyis 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-5: yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-8: gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na'ang sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-10: dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu'ang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bskyabs nas phan btags te nges par 'byung ba thob par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-11: da ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag ma med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-13: mi yi ston par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202a-14: gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-0: nyon @202b mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba 'thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcang de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-2: nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-3: bskal pa grangs med tshad med snyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-4: res 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-5: rtag par sbyin pa che ba btang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-6: shin tu phangs ba'i lus btang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-7: 'khor ba las ni nges byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-8: byang chub dam pa phyin par smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-9: sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-10: yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-11: rgyal bu dpa' bo zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-12: rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-13: de la phu bo gnyis yod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-14: sgra chen lha chen zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-15: gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:202b-16: mthar gyis ri dang nags tshal phyin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206a-29: sa las 'phags te byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das @206b kyis sngon gyi rgyud 'di bstan pa na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-1: mi'i skye bo'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa snyed yongs su gdung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-2: dga' ba chen po skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-3: sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-4: byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la yang bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-5: ngas ni drin lan glan pa'i phyir gus pas phyag byas pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par bsdus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-7: mchod rten de yang slar sa'i 'og tu bying bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-8: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-9: lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-10: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-11: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed so so nas rang gi zhing khams nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la phyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:206b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-1: ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-2: 'od zer kun gsal gser gyi ri bo [?] 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-3: rnam dag rab mnyen padma dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-4: mtshan mchog dam pa tshad med kun tu bkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-5: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-6: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-7: 'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yong ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-8: dri bral dper na rnam dag zla nya 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-9: gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-10: seng+ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-11: dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po mthun mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-12: ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-13: bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-14: 'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-15: mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-16: yon tan rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-17: yongs rdzogs 'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-18: rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-19: nyon mongs sred pa'i bag chags kun bsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-20: chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-21: thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-22: da ltar slad ma'i dus kyi bde ba stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207a-23: rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-0: yang dag rab dben mya ngan @207b 'das la 'god //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-1: bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i chos mchog rab bstan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-2: bdud rtsi'i gya nom don ni stsol mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-3: bdud rtsi'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-4: bdud rtsi'i 'dus ma byas kyi bde la 'god //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-5: rtag par 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-6: sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-7: de dag bde ba shul du rab btsud de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-8: yid bzhin bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-9: bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-10: dpe ni mang po dag gis rig mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-11: rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-12: thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-13: bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-14: bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du ni; ;lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsam kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-15: cha shas tsam yang rig par yang mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-16: bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-17: thigs pa 'ga' zhig bsngags pa brjod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-18: bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsgos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-19: thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur thob smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:207b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-0: khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems @208a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-1: can la phan 'dogs shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas sdig pa rnams yongs su byang nas bsod nams tshad med pa snyed skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-2: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-3: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-5: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-6: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-7: thub pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rdzogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-8: yon tan tshad ma mchis pas sku rab brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-9: rnam dag rgya chen sems can lta mos pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-10: nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis snang bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-11: kha dog mtha' yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-12: rin chen padma'i phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-13: dper na gdugs shar nam mkha' snang bzhin bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-14: kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-15: gser gyi ri bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208a-16: zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-0: @208b sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-1: bde ba dam pa mtha' yas stsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-2: mtshan rnams phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-3: sems can lta mos skyo ba yongs ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-4: dbu skra rab mnyen kha dog me tog bsdus pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-5: dgyes dang btang snyoms chen po dag pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-6: byams dang thugs rje dag ni phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-7: mtshan dang dpe byad dam pa rab mdzes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-8: byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-9: bcom ldan bsod nams phan yon mang btang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-10: de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-11: yon tan dam pa sna tshogs rab rgyal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-12: 'od kyis zhing ni brgya stong snang bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-13: bcom ldan 'od zer shin tu rdzogs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-14: dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-15: bcom ldan ri rab bzhin du yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-16: phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par ston par mdzad; ;bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-17: tshems dkar gtams pa dung gi kha dog 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-18: bcom ldan zhal mdzes dpe zla yong ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-19: smin mtshams ba spu rtag par g-yas su 'khyil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-20: 'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:208b-21: dper na zla nya nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-1: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-2: khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-3: thams cad la phan gdogs par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-4: gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-5: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-6: byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-7: de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-8: bcom ldan rnam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-9: rnam dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-10: chos min spong ba'i blo la gus phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-11: kye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-12: kye ma mthong dka' au dum b'a ra 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-13: kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i ri rgyal 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-14: kye ma ngo mtshar bde gshegs 'od tshad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-15: kye ma ngo mtshar kha bsgyur smon lam che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209a-16: kye ma ngo mtshar sh'aka rigs nyi ma 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-0: 'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas @209b bshad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-1: brtse bas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-2: thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam 'jog pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-3: rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-4: rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la rab zhugs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-5: rab dben spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-6: rkang gnyis gtso bo rab dben bzhugs pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-7: nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-8: chas rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-9: sems can thams cad kyang ni stong zhing dben //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-10: bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-11: bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan mthong bar mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-12: bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-13: rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang mjal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-14: bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas; ;rtag par zhal lta sems kyis mi spong smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-15: rab tu gdung sems bar chad ma mchis par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-16: rtag par rim gro bgyid kyang skyo mi bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-17: bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni rab bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-18: mdangs ldan zhal ni bdag gis rtag mthong mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-19: bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-20: rtag par lha mi dag ni bsgral bar smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-21: sku ni rang bzhin rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-22: sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi zla ba mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:209b-23: bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-0: yon tan phung po thams cad skyed par @210a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-1: smon; ;bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-2: bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul ngas ma mi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-3: nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar mi 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-4: drang srong byang chub sems dpa'i dpog mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-6: thugs rje chen po'i sku ni rtag mthong smon; ;las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-7: myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-9: tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-11: khyod kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi brdzun pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-13: gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-14: mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-16: bsod nams 'dis khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210a-17: sems can thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor bsgom par 'gyur la gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-0: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par @210b rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-1: byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-2: de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas yang dag pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa sku yang dag par gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-5: zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-6: spyan padma sngon po dang mtshungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-8: chu shel gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-9: shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-10: tshems dkar zhing thags bzang bas me tog ku mu da dang mtshungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-11: 'od kyis kun tu snang bar mdzad pas nyi ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-12: 'od kyi kha dog kun tu khyab pas 'dzam bu'i gser dang 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-13: tshig gsung ba la nor zhing 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-15: thugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa'ang de bzhin du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:210b-16: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-0: spyod yul rnams rtag par rnam par dag @211a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-2: spyod lam ma lags pa spangs pas gshegs shing bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul ba mi mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-3: lo drug dka' ba mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-4: sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-5: sku'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa n+ya gro dha'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas phrin las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-8: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-9: gang ci gsung yang rung ste rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pas don ma mchis par mi gsung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-10: sh'akya'i rigs kyi nang nas seng ge chen por gyur pas rab tu brtan cing dpa' pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-11: rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211a-12: deng bdag gi nyams kyis ci tsam lcogs pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-0: dper na sbrang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang bsod nams de'i dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan @211b du spangs nas bla na med pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-2: khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms pa las spobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-3: ded nga'i yon tan rgya cher bsngags pa brjod pa legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-5: 'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo mngon par rtogs nas mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-6: dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-7: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-8: lha mo spobs pa chen mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-12: 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-13: khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-14: ngas bskal ba chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de thob pa'i chos shin tu zab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-15: byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:211b-16: byed la yang dag par bstan zin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-0: khyed cag las su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs @212a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-1: 'di gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas rgya cher yang dag par spel te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-2: yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-3: de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-4: lha'i 'khor phal mang po bye ba phrag drug cu mgrin gcig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-7: bdag cag thams cad la'ang mos ba'i sems mchis pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba mdzad de brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag par gang lags pa de la gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-9: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na'ang lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-10: srog la phangs pa ma mchis par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher spel te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-11: yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bgyid do zhes gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa; bcom ldan yang dag bden tshig gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-13: yang dag chos la rab tu zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212a-14: yang dag bden pa de dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-0: thugs @212b rje chen po'i go man bas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-1: thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-2: da dung thugs rje de stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-4: bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-5: ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-6: tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-8: bdud rnams thams cad rab brtul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-9: log smra thams cad rnam par bshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-10: ngan lta thams cad bsal ba'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-12: 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-13: tshangs pa dang ni lha ma yin; ;klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-15: sa yi steng dang mkha' gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-16: yun ring 'dir ni gnas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-17: bcom ldan bstan pa 'dzin bgyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-19: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mtshungs ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-20: 'phags bden bzhi yis rab brgyan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-21: bdud rnams dag ni pham mdzad slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-23: nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-24: thogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur srid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung bzung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-26: sus kyang bsgul zhing bskyod mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:212b-27: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di bsrung ba bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-0: @213a *// so so nas rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i sems kyis cig char mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-1: bdag cag mdo sde 'di la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-2: bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-3: thams cad rtse gcig rab bsrungs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-4: rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-5: gang zhig mdo 'di rab bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-6: byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-7: bdag cag rtag par phyogs bzhi nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-8: srung skyob rim gro dag kyang bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-9: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-10: sangs rgyas chos ni thugs chud nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-11: drin ni bsab par bzhed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-12: byang chub sems dpa' phan gdags slar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-14: bdag kyang sangs rgyas de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-15: drin bsab slad du rtag mchod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-17: mdo sde 'di la srung bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-18: de nas dga' ldan pa'i lha'i bu rnams gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-19: bcom ldan gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-20: gang zhig 'dzin par bgyid pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-21: byang chub gnas skabs gnas pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213a-22: dga' ldan lhar ni skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-0: bcom ldan @213b bdag cag rab dga' nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-1: lha yi rnam smin mchog spangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-2: 'dzam gling dag tu gnas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-3: mdo sde 'di ni sgrogs par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-4: de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-5: bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-6: rnam thar tshad med thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-7: mdo sde 'di las byung bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-8: de slad mdo 'di rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-9: mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-10: tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-11: mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-12: rtag par yongs su srung skyob bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-13: de nas bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshong dpon zhes bya bas kyang gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-14: yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mdo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-15: bdud spyod rjes su mi 'brang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-16: bdud kyi las ngan sbyong bgyid ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-18: bdag cag mdo sde 'di la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-19: brtson pa dag gis rab bsrungs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-20: brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-21: kun tu rgya cher spel bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-22: de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-23: gang zhig mdo sde 'di bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-24: nyon mongs rnams ni pham bgyid pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:213b-25: de 'dra'i sems can de dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-3: bdud rnams kyis ni glags mi rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-4: bcom ldan byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-5: bdag gis de la srung bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-6: de nas lha'i bu bkra shis dam pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-8: mdo sde 'di las ston pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-9: gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin bgyid pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-10: de bzhin gshegs la mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-11: bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-12: bye ba'i lha la rab bshad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-13: gus par nyan par bgyid pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-14: byang chub gnas su bskul bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gus par thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-16: byang chub la ni rab gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-17: gsol ba ma btab grogs mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-18: lus [?] srog dag kyang rab spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-19: mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di srung bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-21: dga' ldan lha gnas mchis nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-22: bcom ldan byin brlabs dbang gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-23: lha mi rgya chen ston par bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-24: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214a-25: bcom ldan nyan thos theg par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-0: bdag ni shes rab chung bar @214b gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-1: deng bdag rang gi stobs kyis mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-4: bdag gi de ni rang bsrungs ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-5: tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu stsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-6: rjes 'brang rtag par legs zhes brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-8: bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-9: mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-11: nam yang thos par yong ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-12: deng bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-13: mngon thos yongs su bzung bas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-14: gang dag byang chub mos pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-15: rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-18: mi'i 'khor mang po de dag so so nas mdo sde rgya cher spel zhing rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-20: yongs su bsrung bar sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-21: sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs par gzigs pa dang legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:214b-22: legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas; khyod kyis 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di sems rtse gcig tu rgya cher spel nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-0: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang 'thor zhing nub @215a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-1: par mi 'gyur bar byed pa de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa yin pas bsod nams ji snyed cig 'thob par 'gyur ba ni bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-8: rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa gang la la zhig mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-9: bkur bsti byas nas yi ger bris te rgya cher spel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-10: gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed pas thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-11: de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang yang dag pa'i brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-12: de nas tshad med mtha' med pa'i gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-13: shin tu dang ba'i dad pas yang dag par blangs nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-14: gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215a-15: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215b-0: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa @215b mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215b-1: zhus chen gyi mkhan po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-089-001:215b-2: lo ts'a ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs ba ne chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
